Founding Engineer Wanted | Defense Startup | Munich/Remote Can You Solve This? The Challenge: An FPV drone flies at 100 km/h. You have to detect, track, and intercept it physically. No Cloud. Just on-board compute using: ‚Ä¢ YOLOv8 Nano on Qualcomm QRB5165 Flight controller + NPU SoC. Don't know Qualcomm yet? No problem! If you have pushed Nvidia Jetson or Hailo-8 to their absolute limits, you have the mindset we need. ‚Ä¢ Autonomous guidance using Proportional Navigation, MPC, or PID/LQR control loops If that sounds impossible, you're right. It's one of the hardest problems in counter-drone defense. FPV kamikaze drones dominate modern warfare. Existing defense solutions are incapable of countering this emerging threat. We're Herakles ‚Äì Munich-based defense startup building autonomous interceptor drones. What we offer: Equity | Founding Engineer role | Full tech autonomy Your skills: Drones, Embedded Systems, Computer Vision, or Robotics Mission: Stop FPV kamikaze drones from killing soldiers. Building the "Iron Dome" for infantry Interested in hard problems? Find the full mission and apply here: ‚Üí<https://www.herakles-defense.com/founding-engineer>

postTitle: Head of Data Intelligence  at Supabase
jobTitle: Head of Data Intelligence  at Supabase
descContent:
### Job Description

Supabase is on a mission to build the world‚Äôs best open-source backend
platform for developers. We are looking for a **Head of Data Intelligence** to
lead our exponential growth into the next chapter.

This role is an unprecedented opportunity to have an immense impact. You will
raise the data IQ of the entire organization, enabling teams to make data-
informed decisions that improve the products we ship to developers every day.
You'll inject data throughout all business processes‚Äîfrom strategic planning
and prioritization to execution and measurement of success.

If you are excited to build a team of analysts, inject best practices across
the organization, and drive the insights that shape our future, we‚Äôd love for
you to join us.

### The Stack

  * **Data Warehouse:** BigQuery

  * **Transformation:** dbt

  * **Analytics:** Hex, PostHog

  * **Languages:** SQL

### What You‚Äôll Do

  * **Build & Lead the Team:** You will build, develop, and lead a high-performing team of analysts to deliver insights on user behavior, platform usage, and business success.

  * **Own the Data Strategy:** As the owner of our end-to-end data strategy, you will help scale analytics at Supabase‚Äîuncovering and sharing critical insights that will shape our roadmap and the future of our company.

  * **Drive Cross-Functional Impact:** Partner cross-functionally with leaders from Engineering, Growth, and Go-to-Market teams to scale our data infrastructure, develop analytical frameworks, and grow tools that enable data-driven decisions.

  * **Operationalize Metrics:** Ensure every business area has health metrics to track, insights that inform strategy, and success dashboards that inform development.

  * **Champion Data Culture:** Build a data-centric culture and act as an internal champion for analytics and data literacy throughout the organization.

  * **Solve Complex Problems:** Turn loosely defined problems into practical analyses and actionable insights.

  * **Unlock Growth Opportunities:** Identify opportunities to drive increased customer conversion, retention, engagement, and lifetime value through both data and a deep qualitative understanding of our customers.

  * **Ensure Data Integrity:** Implement best-in-class analytical frameworks and testing structures across the entire organization to ensure that data insights are always accurate.

### What You‚Äôll Bring

  * **8+ Years of Analytical Excellence:** You have a deep history in highly analytical roles, ideally within SaaS, developer tools, or infrastructure companies.

  * **Proven Leadership:** 3+ years of experience as a leader managing teams, with a strong track record of developing, motivating, and inspiring analytical talent.

  * **Bias for Action:** You are a demonstrated self-starter and incredible prioritizer who moves fast, takes ownership of projects, and drives them to completion without much guidance.

  * **Strategic Problem Solving:** You possess a high degree of experience translating broad, abstract questions into structured analysis and actionable solutions.

  * **Communication Superpowers:** You have strong written and verbal communication skills and a demonstrated ability to distill complex analytical solutions into actionable insights for the broader team.

  * **Organizational Growth:** Experience scaling a data-driven team by hiring exceptional talent and maturing a data organization‚Äîfrom data instrumentation to dashboarding, insight discovery, and experimentation.

  * **Technical Proficiency:** Advanced proficiency in SQL, a strong understanding of data warehouse principles, and experience with BI tools (Hex, Tableau).

  * **Modern Stack Experience:** Experience with best-in-class analytics tech stacks, including PostHog, Segment, BigQuery, dbt, and Hex.

### Why Join Supabase?

  * **Remote-First Team:** Work from anywhere, connect with colleagues around the globe, and enjoy a flexible, async-friendly environment.

  * **Developer-Centric Culture:** We live and breathe open source. You‚Äôll have plenty of opportunities to contribute to (and leverage) the open-source community for data solutions.

  * **Ownership & Impact:** This isn‚Äôt a button-pushing gig. You‚Äôll have full trust and autonomy to own projects from day one‚Äîand see real results from your work.

  * **Collaborative Atmosphere:** We‚Äôre big on pairing up when it makes sense and dividing to conquer when needed. Either way, you‚Äôll be surrounded by whip-smart folks eager to ship.

### **What We Offer**

  * **Fully Remote**

We hire globally. We believe you can do your best work from anywhere. There
are no Supabase offices, but we provide a WeWork membership or co-working
allowance you can use anywhere in the world.

  * **ESOP**

Every team member receives ESOP (equity ownership) in the company. We want
everyone to share in the upside of what we‚Äôre building together.

  * **Tech Allowance**

Use this budget to set up your ideal work environment‚Äîlaptop, monitor,
headphones, or whatever helps you do your best work.

  * **Health Benefits**

Supabase covers 100% of health insurance for employees and 80% for dependents,
wherever you are. Your wellbeing and your family‚Äôs health are important to us.

  * **Annual Off-Sites**

Once a year, the entire company gathers in a new city for a week of
connection, collaboration, and fun. It‚Äôs a highlight of our year.

  * **Flexible Work**

We operate asynchronously and trust you to manage your own time. You know what
needs to be done and when.

  * **Professional Development**

Every team member receives an annual education allowance to spend on
learning‚Äîcourses, books, conferences, or anything that supports your growth.

### **About the Team**

Supabase was born-remote and open-source-first. We believe our globally
distributed team is our secret weapon in building tools developers love.

  * 180+ team members

  * 40+ countries

  * 15+ languages spoken

  * $496M raised

  * 430,000+ community members

  * 30,000+ memes posted (and counting)

We move fast, build in public, and use what we ship. If it‚Äôs in your project,
we probably use it in ours too. We believe deeply in the open-source ecosystem
and strive to support‚Äînot replace‚Äîexisting tools and communities.

### **Hiring Process**

We keep things simple, async-friendly, and respectful of your time:

  1. Apply ‚Äì Our team will review your application.

  2. Intro Call ‚Äì A short video chat to get to know each other.

  3. Interviews ‚Äì Up to four calls with:

     * Founders

     * Future teammates

     * Someone cross-functional from product, growth, or engineering (depending on the role)

  4. Decision ‚Äì We may follow up with a final question or go straight to offer.

All communication is remote and we aim to move fast.

postTitle: Production Risk Engineer - Architects & Engineers (West) at Counterpart
jobTitle: Production Risk Engineer - Architects & Engineers (West) at Counterpart
descContent:
Counterpart is an insurtech platform reimagining management and professional
liability for the modern workplace. We believe that when businesses lead with
clarity and confidence, they become more resilient, more innovative, and
better prepared for what‚Äôs ahead. That‚Äôs why we built the first Agentic
Insurance‚Ñ¢ system ‚Äî where advanced AI and deep insurance expertise come
together to proactively assess, mitigate, and manage risk. Backed by A rated
carriers and trusted by brokers nationwide, our platform helps small
businesses grow with confidence. Join us in shaping a smarter future, helping
businesses Do More With Less Risk¬Æ.

As a member of the risk engineering team, you will be responsible for the
production of premium through proper risk analysis and effective distribution
of our product. In collaboration with the engineering, design, data, and
operations team, you will leverage your industry knowledge and broker
relationships to develop management liability and professional liability
insurance products that brokers are eager to promote to their clients.

**AS A PRODUCTION RISK ENGINEER YOU WILL:**

  * Achieve and exceed underwriting performance and revenue goals, underwriting in accordance with our stated procedures.
  * Price accounts with competitive terms quickly, thoughtfully, and in accordance with our guidelines.
  * Manage quote related communication and questions in a thoughtful and trusting manner.
  * Collaborate with the underwriting team of Risk Engineers on understanding the unique exposures of complex accounts.
  * Provide market feedback and recommend improvements to our terms, rates, and guidelines improving our policy forms and coverages 
  * Bind accounts through the continuous engagement of your assigned brokers.
  * Represent Counterpart at broker meetings and various industry events. 
  * Contribute ideas and feedback on our suite of tools and services as a key stakeholder of our product roadmap.

**WE LOOK FOR TEAMMATES WHO HAVE:**

  * 3-8 years of underwriting experience in the respective product.
  * A network of brokers, carriers, underwriters, or clients in the management liability or professional liability insurance space.
  * Expertise in various aspects of specialty liability products (e.g. rating procedures, policy forms, applications and coverage endorsements). 
  * Ability to successfully engage with brokers to establish long-term, profitable partnerships with brokerages.
  * Confidence presenting to key internal and external stakeholders. 
  * Demonstrated success with high performing sales and account management practices.
  * A proven track record of success, achieving and exceeding monthly, quarterly and annual targets.
  * Enthusiasm for continuous challenges in a high velocity environment.
  * Flexibility for travel, when necessary (once per month as a minimum)
  * College Degree with relevant work experience of 4+ years.

**WHO YOU WILL WORK WITH:**

  * **Tanner Hackett, CEO:** Having founded two other major startups, including Button and Lazada, Tanner now spends his time focused on mental health through his philanthropy,[ Openminded.org](http://openminded.org), in addition to reading, surfing, yoga, and enjoying the outdoors.
  * **Cameron Tognetti, Territory Manager:** Cameron began his insurance career underwriting at Chubb and later Tokio Marine HCC. He is known for exceptional service standards and a deep understanding of management liability coverage.
  * **Brad Bahler, Director of Field Underwriting:** Brad has over a decade of experience in management liability underwriting. He managed one of the largest books of small business management liability risks at Travelers, where he was known for his deep understanding of coverage, outstanding submission response times, and boundless enthusiasm for the space.
  * **Jake O‚ÄôDonnell, Territory Manager:** Jake started his insurance career at Chubb, where he was able to develop and grow a profitable book of private-for-profit and non-profit management liability business. Jake is known for his exceptional service to industry brokers and his extensive knowledge of management liability. Jake also is a CPCU designation recipient.

**WHAT WE OFFER**

  * **Fully remote workplace**
  * **Unlimited Vacation** : We offer flexible time off, allowing you to take time when you need it.
  * **Work from Anywhere** : Counterpart is a fully distributed company, meaning there is no office. We allow employees to work from wherever they do their best work, and invite the team to meet in person a couple times per year.
  * **Stock Options**
  * **Health, Dental, and Vision Coverage**
  * **401(k) Retirement Plan**
  * **Parental Leave**
  * **Home Office Allowance** : **to set up your home office** with the necessary equipment and accessories.
  * **Wellness Stipend**
  * **Book stipend**
  * **Professional Development Reimbursement**
  * **No working birthdays** : **Take your birthday off** , giving you the opportunity to relax, enjoy your special day, and spend time with loved ones.
  * **Charitable Contribution Matching**

**COUNTERPART'S VALUES**

  * **Conjoin Expectations** \- it is the cornerstone of autonomy. Ensure you are aware of what is expected of you and clearly articulate what you expect of others. 
  * **Speak Boldly & Honestly** \- the only failure is not learning from mistakes. Don‚Äôt cheat yourself and your colleagues of the feedback needed when expectations aren‚Äôt being met. 
  * **Be Entrepreneurial** \- control your own destiny. Embrace action over perfection while navigating any obstacles that stand in the way of your ultimate goal. 
  * **Practice Omotenashi** (‚Äúselfless hospitality‚Äù) - trust will follow. Consider every interaction with internal and external partners an opportunity to develop trust by going above and beyond what is expected. 
  * **Hold Nothing As Sacred** \- create routines but modify them routinely.**** Take the time to reflect on where the business is today, where it needs to go, and what you have to change in order to get there. 
  * **Prioritize Wellness** \- some things should never be sacrificed. We create an environment that stretches everyone to grow and improve, which is fulfilling, but is only one part of a meaningful life.  
  

Our estimated pay range for this role is $120,000 to $170,000. Base salary is
determined by a variety of factors, including but not limited to, market data,
location, internal equitability, and experience.

We are committed to being a welcoming and inclusive workplace for everyone,
and we are intentional about making sure people feel respected, supported and
connected at work‚Äîregardless of who you are or where you come from. We value
and celebrate our differences and we believe being open about who we are
allows us to do the best work of our lives.

We are an Equal Opportunity Employer. We do not discriminate against qualified
applicants or employees on the basis of race, color, religion, gender
identity, sex, sexual preference, sexual identity, pregnancy, national origin,
ancestry, citizenship, age, marital status, physical disability, mental
disability, medical condition, military status, or any other characteristic
protected by federal, state, or local law, rule, or regulation.

postTitle: Lead UX Writer (Remote - Work from Anywhere) at Xapo Bank
jobTitle: Lead UX Writer (Remote - Work from Anywhere) at Xapo Bank
descContent:
Work from anywhere, impact everywhere

Diversity is at the heart of who we are at Xapo Bank. We‚Äôre a fully
distributed team of over 130 Xapiens that work remotely from 30+ countries
around the world.

Our beginning: A world that enjoys economic freedom and wealth protection, no
matter where you live or who is running your country.

To achieve that, we search the world for the best people for the job. We work
hard, think globally, and inspire each other to learn and grow. We are
committed to changing the way things are done.

_Although we are headquartered in Gibraltar, this is a full time, 100% remote
position  
_ _Work from anywhere!_

**Position overview**

  
We are seeking an exceptional Lead UX Writer to join our Design and Product
team. Your mission is to redefine the voice of the Xapo Bank mobile
application, transforming complexity into a seamless, premium and human-
centric mobile experience. In this high-impact role, you will audit and
elevate the current user interface, smoothing out friction from our private
banking and crypto flows. You will own the in-app content strategy that builds
trust, ensuring that every word on screen empowers our Members to manage their
Bitcoin with absolute confidence.

**Responsibilities _  
_**

App Content Strategy & Voice

  * Define and own the Content Design System and Voice & Tone guidelines for the Xapo mobile application, ensuring consistency with our Brand, across our hybrid Bitcoin-fiat ecosystem.
  * Audit existing user flows to identify opportunities for enhancement, creating a strategic roadmap to refine and optimise the core Member experience.
  * Collaborate with Legal and Compliance to translate complex regulatory requirements into transparent, easy-to-understand language without compromising accuracy.

UX Writing & Execution

  * Drive execution of end-to-end content design, crafting microcopy, onboarding flows, error messages and instructional text that guides high-net-worth individuals through complex financial transactions.
  * Work intimately with Product Managers, Product Designers and Engineering to embed content strategy into the design process from the earliest ideation phase, ensuring copy is not an afterthought but a core design element.
  * Simplify the complexity of our financial technology products for a non-technical yet financially savvy audience, making the "invisible" mechanics of Bitcoin feel accessible, secure and safe.

Research & Optimisation

  * Conduct copy testing, sentiment analysis and comprehension research to validate that our terminology resonates with a global audience and instills trust.
  * Partner with the Data and Product teams to analyse drop-off points in conversion funnels (e.g., KYC, deposits) and iterate on copy to improve success rates and Member retention.

Thought Leadership & Influence

  * Serve as the company's leading advocate for Content Design, educating stakeholders on the ROI of clear writing and influencing the product roadmap to prioritise comprehension and usability.
  * Work closely with the Marketing team and other writers and contributors within the organisation, fostering a culture of writing excellence and attention to detail.

**Skills Needed**

  * 5+ years of UX Writing or Content Design experience, specifically within Fintech, Wealth Management or Cryptocurrency sectors.
  * Demonstrable track record of evolving or transforming complex applications, resulting in improved usability scores, reduced support tickets or increased conversion rates.
  * Proven experience working in a regulated environment, successfully balancing legal constraints with user-centric clarity.
  * A strong portfolio showcasing end-to-end user journeys (onboarding, transactional flows, troubleshooting) where complex problems were solved through text.
  * Expertise in simplifying financial jargon. You understand the difference between custody and self-custody, SWIFT and SEPA and can explain them simply.
  * Deep understanding of accessibility standards (WCAG) and inclusive design principles.
  * Familiarity with behavioural economics and how language influences financial decision-making and trust.
  * Knowledge of localisation best practices and how to write for a global audience where English may be a second language.
  * Understanding of mobile-first design patterns (iOS and Android guidelines).

Product

  * A self-starter with the decisiveness required to own the application's narrative in a rapidly evolving scale-up environment.
  * An empathetic, user-first mindset with an obsession for clarity and brevity.
  * Proficiency with modern design tools (Figma, Sketch) and the ability to work directly within design files.
  * Ability to manage stakeholders and negotiate copy decisions with Legal, Compliance and Product leadership using data and rationale.
  * You make data-informed decisions and challenge the status quo using first principles thinking.
  * Deep understanding of Agile methodologies and experience working in cross-functional product teams.

**Other requirements**

  * A dedicated workspace.
  * A reliable and stable internet connection
  * Devices and other essential equipment that meet minimal technical specifications.
  * Alignment with Our Values and the Xapo Values-Driven Leadership principles.

**Why work for Xapo?**

IMPACT GLOBALLY, WORK REMOTELY.

  * **Shape the Future:** Improve lives through cutting-edge technology, work 100% remotely from anywhere in the world.
  * **Great work-life balance:** Build amazing things with a balance of autonomy and collaborative teamwork. Set your own work schedule and make use of a flexible PTO plan when you need to recharge.
  * **Expect Excellence:** Collaborate, learn, and grow with a high-performance team. Learn how you learn best - from books to conferences, you‚Äôll get a yearly budget for your individual learning and development goals.

**At Xapo, we prioritize consumer protection and adhere to regulatory
requirements by ensuring that all Xapiens are accountable for upholding
principles of fair treatment, transparency, and ethical conduct in their
interactions with customers and stakeholders.  
**

WHO WE'RE LOOKING FOR

The ideal copywriter has excellent English writing skills and is excited to
write high-quality, SEO-driven content that aligns with detailed, client-
specific guidelines. Projects most commonly include writing web pages for
eCommerce and lead generation business sites such as category pages, product
descriptions, and blog posts. Our clientele is constantly evolving. We produce
content for these and many other industry verticals:

Fashion (both mass-market and luxury)

Skincare & Beauty

Tech & Software**

Finance & Investing**

Law (family law, product liability, divorce, etc.)**

Education

Home Improvement

Automobiles & Motorcycles (OEM and aftermarket accessories)

Health and Wellness**

Medical / Clinical**

Digital Marketing

SEO / PR / Advertising / Marketing**

**Writers with a background in these highly specialized fields are strongly
encouraged to apply.

The ideal candidate for this position is a multifaceted technical and creative
writer with at least two to four years of professional, non-academic
experience. Candidates should understand how to write content that
effortlessly blends SEO best practices and brand priorities for finished work
that‚Äôs engaging, creative, and ROI-driven. Candidates should also be willing
and able to complete careful research in order to gain a strong understanding
of various industries. Candidates should be prepared to provide portfolios
featuring published work. Once an offer has been extended, writers will be
asked to take a brief training course.

Compensation

Writers are paid on a per-word basis. The rate is assessed according to our
KPI rubric (key performance indicators) with an automatic raise after 400 and
800 pages have gone live on our client's websites.

Initial compensation is up to $0.06 per word with $0.034 per word being the
most typical compensation level. This is $30 or $17 per page of 500 words.

After 400 pages live, the top marginal rate increases to $0.064 per word with
the most typical rate of $0.038 per word, or $32 and $19 per page. After 800
pages live, the top marginal rate increases to $0.07 per word with $0.044 per
word being the most typical, or $35 and $22 per page.

postTitle: Senior Partner Marketing Manager  at Camunda
jobTitle: Senior Partner Marketing Manager  at Camunda
descContent:
Camunda is the **leader in enterprise agentic automation, orchestrating
complex business processes** , including high-value knowledge work, across
agents, people, and systems. By creating production-ready, enterprise-grade
agents with built-in governance, Camunda uniquely delivers trusted AI agents
for business-critical processes. **Over 700 leading innovators like Atlassian,
ING, and Vodafone, rely on Camunda** to slash time-to-value from months to
days, boost operational efficiency, and elevate customer experiences. Camunda
was named a****_**Visionary**_**** in the inaugural [**2025 Gartner¬Æ Magic
Quadrant‚Ñ¢**](https://page.camunda.com/wp-2025-gartner-magic-quadrant-for-
boat)**** for Business Orchestration and Automation Technologies (BOAT).

  

**As a fully remote, global company, we‚Äôre rewriting the rules of modern
business.** Named [GP Bullhound‚Äôs 2024 Top 100 Next Unicorn
list,](https://www.gpbullhound.com/articles/top-100-next-unicorns-the-uk-
france-and-germany-lead-with-the-most-promising-technology-companies-in-
europe/) certified as a **Great Place to Work** , and recognized by [Flexa for
true flexibility](https://flexa.careers/companies/camunda), we‚Äôre growing fast
and looking for top talent to join our team. If you‚Äôre excited to do
meaningful work and make real impact, keep reading, **this role could be the
one you‚Äôve been waiting for.**

**About the Role:**

The Senior Partner Marketing Manager plays a leading role in driving channel
and partner marketing strategies to new heights. Their extensive knowledge and
expertise in marketing tactics empower them to lead and support partners in
driving demand through highly effective joint marketing campaigns, co-branded
collateral, and lead generation activities. With a deep understanding of
market trends, customer needs, and the competitive landscape, they identify
strategic opportunities for partner collaboration, fostering impactful joint
marketing initiatives.

**What you'll be doing:**

  * Partner marketing strategy and execution: Develop and implement integrated partner marketing programs that drive joint demand generation, brand awareness, and market expansion in collaboration with channel and technology partners.

  * Joint campaign development: Lead the creation of co-marketed campaigns, including webinars, events, digital programs, and content assets that highlight shared value propositions and accelerate pipeline growth.

  * Co-branded content and collateral: Produce high-quality co-branded materials such as solution briefs, case studies, landing pages, and marketing toolkits that enable partners to effectively position and promote Camunda.

  * Partner collaboration and enablement: Work closely with partners to understand their business priorities, align on marketing strategies, provide enablement resources, and ensure successful execution of joint initiatives.

  * Lead generation and funnel acceleration: Manage programs that generate qualified leads through partner channels and ensure timely follow-up and pipeline progression partnering with Sales and Alliances teams.

  * Market and competitive insights: Monitor market trends, partner ecosystem dynamics, and competitor activities to identify new opportunities for partner collaboration and optimize marketing approaches.

  * Event and campaign orchestration: Support partner participation in industry events, field marketing activities, and regional campaigns, ensuring alignment with overall GTM strategy and consistent brand representation.

  * Performance tracking and reporting: Define KPIs for partner marketing programs, track performance, analyze outcomes, and deliver insights that drive continuous improvement and increased partner ROI. 

**What you bring:**

  * Experience in B2B marketing, with a focus on partner, channel, or alliance marketing in a SaaS or technology environment.

  * Strong project management skills with the ability to execute multiple partner programs, campaigns, and deliverables concurrently.

  * Exceptional communication and storytelling skills, with demonstrated ability to develop compelling co-branded content and messaging.

  * Proven experience collaborating with cross-functional teams such as Alliances, Sales, Product Marketing, and Field Marketing.

  * Strong relationship-building skills with the ability to influence and motivate partners to execute joint marketing initiatives.

  * Proficiency in digital marketing tactics, campaign development, and marketing automation tools.

  * Analytical skills to evaluate campaign performance, interpret data, and make data-driven decisions that optimize partner marketing efforts.

  * Ability to work independently, manage ambiguity, and drive initiatives forward with strong decision-making and ownership.Ability and/or willingness to use [our product](https://accounts.cloud.camunda.io/signup?_ga=2.47330343.127558761.1654184528-504024057.1654184528).

_**This role is an existing vacancy/an upcoming vacancy**_

#LI-SE1 #LI-DNI

**What We Have to Offer:**

**Compensation**

We offer competitive, fair, and transparent compensation. Salary ranges are
location-based, with Standard and Major markets (global tech hubs) reflecting
local competition.

**The Annual Total Target Cash**(base salary + 100% variable target, where
applicable) shown below spans from the minimum in a Standard market to the
maximum in a Major market. Final offers depend on **skills** , **experience**
, and **location** , and we typically hire in the first half of the range to
allow room for growth:

  * United States: **$124,200.00** to **$200,200.00**

  * United Kingdom: **¬£78,000.00** to**¬£128,200.00**

  * Singapore: **S$154,200.00** to **S$231,300.00**

  * Germany:**‚Ç¨80,200.00** to **‚Ç¨132,700.00**

If you‚Äôre based elsewhere, you‚Äôll be hired via
[**Remote.com**](http://Remote.com) (our global employer partner), and your
Talent Acquisition Partner will provide a personalized **Total Rewards
Calculator** after your first interview.

**Equity:** We also offer equity (where applicable) through our [**Virtual
Stock Option Plan
(VSOP)**](https://confluence.camunda.com/spaces/BP/pages/123315208/Virtual+Employee+Stock+Option+Plan+%E2%80%9CVSOP%E2%80%9D).

**Benefits & Perks**

We invest in your wellbeing, growth, and ability to connect, along with perks
that support you no matter where you‚Äôre based. Our benefits are globally
designed and locally delivered where applicable.

  * **Remote & Flexible: **Work from anywhere with the setup that suits you, **home office budget, co-working space support, and flexible time off** to recharge when you need it.

  * **In Person Connection:** We invest in meaningful face time through our **Annual Kickoff**(Vienna in 2025, Madrid in 2026!), **team offsites, and Camundi Connection Budgets** , including contributing to meetups while travelling,, and local gatherings with fellow Camundi.

  * **Health & Wellbeing:** Access locally tailored healthcare, **Modern Health** for global mental wellbeing, and our **Live Well Lifestyle Spending Account (LSA),** a flexible, global benefit that puts you in control of your whole life, not just work, from: **staying active, to caring for family, exploring personal passions, meaningful experiences, and investing in your financial wellbeing.** The Live Well program launches in 2026 and scales to **‚Ç¨1,000 annually from 2027**.

  * **Financial Security:** Retirement and pension plans (often with company contributions), plus life and disability insurance where relevant.

  * **Professional Growth:** Up to $/‚Ç¨/¬£1,000 per year for self-driven learning: courses, certifications, books, you decide!

  * **More of what we offer globally & in your country can be found **[**here**](https://confluence.camunda.com/pages/viewpage.action?pageId=110235989)**.**

_‚ÄùEveryone is welcome at Camunda‚Äù_ ‚Äî _it‚Äôs a celebrated component of our
culture. We strive to create an inclusive environment that empowers our
people. At Camunda, we honour diverse cultures and backgrounds and are proud
to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive
consideration without regard to gender, race, ethnicity, religion, belief,
sexual orientation, age, disability or any other protected characteristics
under applicable law. We are looking forward to your application!_

_**Come join us and be part of Camunda‚Äôs incredible journey: Make an impact at
a pivotal moment in our story!**_

_AI Disclaimer: Camunda may use AI tools to aid the screening of
applications._

postTitle: eSIM & Device Engineer - Core Networks at Airalo
jobTitle: eSIM & Device Engineer - Core Networks at Airalo
descContent:
**About Airalo**

Alo! Airalo is the world‚Äôs first eSIM store that helps people connect in over
200+ countries and regions across the globe. We are building the next digital
service that revolutionizes the telecom industry. We are a travel-tech company
and an equal-opportunity environment that values and executes diversity,
inclusion, and equity. Our team is spread across 50+ countries and six
continents. What glues us together is our commitment to changing the way you
connect.

Check out more information about Airalo in our Public Handbook:
<https://airalo-public.notion.site/airalo-public-handbook>

  

**About you**

We hope that you care deeply about the quality of your work, the intrinsic
worth of tasks, and the success of your team. You are self-disciplined and do
not require micromanagement in terms of your skillset and work ethic. You do
your best to flourish as an individual every day while working hard to foster
a collaborative team environment. You believe in the importance of being ‚Äî and
staying ‚Äî authentic, honest, positive, and kind. You are a good interlocutor
with clear and concise communication. You are able to manage multiple
projects, have an analytical mind, pay keen attention to detail, and love to
get your hands dirty. You are cognizant, tolerant, and welcoming of
vulnerabilities and cultural differences.

  

**About the Role**

**Position** : Full-time / Employee

**Location:** Remote-first

**Benefits:** Health Insurance, work-from-anywhere stipend, annual wellness &
learning credits, annual all-expenses-paid company retreat in a gorgeous
destination & other benefits

  

The eSIM & Device Engineer will join our Core Networks Engineering team. They
will be a dedicated specialist focused on Device setting management, driving
our mission toward global connectivity!

### Your main responsibilities will be:

* Design and validate eSIM Electrical Profiles (MVNO/Roaming) following GSMA SGP.22 standards.
* Rigorously test the Local Profile Assistant (LPA) behavior on the latest flagships (iPhone 16, Samsung S24, Pixel 9) to ensure flawless Remote SIM Provisioning.
* Plan and execute Over-the-Air (OTA) campaigns to update eUICC file systems and steering logic for devices already deployed globally.
* Use tools like COMPRION or UL SIMtester to analyze APDU logs and debug communication failures in Remote File Management (RFM).
* Verify Steering of Roaming (SoR) logic on global testbeds, ensuring our users always land on the fastest partner network.
* Minimize profile sizes to guarantee fast downloads over 3G, 4G, and 5G network conditions.
,

### Must Haves:

* 3+ years in mobile device configuration, OTA testing, and managing carrier settings (VoLTE, VoWiFi, APNs).
* Deep knowledge of Apple Carrier Bundles and Android network settings (GSMA NSX).
* You are comfortable navigating EF structures (ICCID, IMSI, PLMN) and analyzing TLS-secured profile downloads.
* You likely have experience working at a Tier 1 Carrier, an MVNO, or a top-tier eSIM vendor (G+D, Thales, IDEMIA).
* Familiarity with Subscription Management orchestration and a "problem-solver" mindset for niche global hardware.
* Fluent English is essential for collaborating across our 50+ country remote team.
,

### Nice to Have:

* Remote testing (e.g. Segron, Mobilium) experience
* Experience with OTA systems e.g. Thales
* Knowledge of mobile network call flows (signalling) for 4G and 5G
* Scripting languages (e.g. python)

If you are interested in this position, **please apply via the link.**

  

By applying, you acknowledge and agree that, in case of successful
application, Airalo may request to run background checks as a condition for
entering into an agreement with you. Rest assured that these checks will only
occur upon your prior consent and at the end of the selection process, and
will be strictly limited to what is allowed under the laws that are applicable
to you. All data that you share or that we collect in connection with such
checks will be processed in accordance with our Privacy Policy, available
here: <https://www.airalo.com/more-info/privacy-
policy?srsltid=AfmBOooBT0rXAj1FaNelZ3VfN0wvhwzvAoxdtHnOKSVETpiSjiXVuycy>

  

We sincerely thank all applicants in advance for submitting their interest in
this opportunity. Airalo is an equal-opportunity employer and values
diversity, equity & inclusion. We do not discriminate on the basis of race,
religion, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status,
veteran status, or disability status. We are committed to providing reasonable
accommodations upon request for individuals with disabilities throughout our
job interview process.

Return | REMOTE | Software engineer backend (Go/Golang) | Full-time

Return (<https://return.energy>) is hiring a software engineer to work on
platforms that accelerate the transition to carbon-free energy. Return‚Äôs main
activity is building and operating industrial-scale Battery Energy Storage
Systems. Our operations are located in the Netherlands, Germany, Belgium, and
Spain. You will make a measurable, country-level impact on the transition to
renewable energy. Return recently raised ‚Ç¨300M to support its growth.

While we employ more than 120 people, Return‚Äôs technical team remains small
with 13 members. Our platform automates processes in energy storage,
monitoring, market optimization, sales, project management, procurement,
construction, and customer service.

During the first three years of operation, we laid the foundation for our
platforms, and we are ready to scale up. This is why we are looking for an
experienced software engineer.

Your primary focus will be to further develop our battery virtualization
platform, enabling customers to use slices of battery capacity distributed
across our fleet of industrial-scale batteries.

Our tech stack and toolset are straightforward: Go, Python, Ruby, PostgreSQL,
TigerData, dbt, Dagster, Grafana, Terraform, and self-hosted plus cloud
compute. We keep meetings to a minimum to provide at least five hours of
uninterrupted coding time per day. We conduct code reviews and apply both
automated and manual testing. Our web apps and platforms are often deployed
multiple times per day.

Return has offices in Amsterdam, Berlin, Brussels, Hamburg, Munich, Madrid,
and Stuttgart. We are very open to remote work as long as you live in the EU.
Our hiring process is swift but thorough: a brief call to get acquainted and
discuss finances, followed by one or more technical interviews, and a paid
visit to Amsterdam to meet the team.

The tech team members have co-founded several companies and have worked with
remote development teams since 2008, and they will personally guide you
through most of the recruiting process (there is no recruiter involved).

We aim to hire you in February or March ultimately.

Apply here: <https://jobs.polymer.co/return/37860>

Level 12 is a software consulting and custom development agency. We have mid

developers. No HR fluff here, we want you to know what you are really getting

Encube Technologies is building collaborative, real-time software for

of the product.

You will work on challenging problems at the intersection of browser-based 3D
rendering, CAD compute algorithms, and real-time collaboration, with a strong
focus on end users and performance. This is hands-on, product-driven
engineering with significant technical depth.

What you will work on \- High-performance, browser-based 3D rendering \-
Compute-heavy CAD and geometry algorithms \- Real-time, multi-user
collaboration features \- Systems bridging frontend graphics and backend
compute

Tech stack

Frontend \- React, Next.js, TypeScript

Graphics \- WebGPU, WebGL2, three.js, React Three Fiber

Backend \- Python microservices with occasional C++ bindings \- Kubernetes-
based infrastructure

We are hiring Senior and Lead Engineers who enjoy ownership, care about
product quality, and like solving difficult technical problems with real-world
impact.

Apply via our website: <https://www.getencube.com/we-are-encube>

Please mention in your cover letter that you found Encube Technologies via Y
Combinator.

Head of Engineering & Infrastructure | Full-Time | Remote | $182k - $272k USD - [https://fetlife.com/jobs/head_of_engineering_and_infrastruct...](https://fetlife.com/jobs/head_of_engineering_and_infrastructure)

Role: Fully own our engineering and infrastructure teams, keep FetLife fast
and reliable for over 12 million members, and free the rest of the leadership
team to focus on product and growth.

Perks: Paid time off (2 weeks vacation, 5 statutory holidays, 2 weeks at
Christmas, 4-day summer workweeks), annual company retreat, anniversary gift
($200/year), monthly music subscription reimbursement, fully paid maternity &
paternity leave.

How to Apply: Email jointheteam+hoei+hn@fetlife.com with a brief introduction,
tell us about the impact you have personally made on an engineering or
infrastructure team you have led, and LinkedIn or resume (PDF).

\---

FetLife | Senior DevOps Engineer | Full-Time | Remote | 115k - 180k USD - <https://fetlife.com/jobs/devops-engineer>

Role: Develop and implement infrastructure upgrades, database tuning,
Kubernetes and Helm orchestration, monitoring, and security. Help maintain and
improve our large-scale Rails monolith, including CI/CD. Participate in on-
call rotation and help automate daily DevOps tasks.

Perks: Paid time off (2 weeks vacation, 5 statutory holidays, 2 weeks at
Christmas, 4-day summer workweeks), annual company retreat, anniversary gift
($200/year), monthly music subscription reimbursement, fully paid maternity &
paternity leave.

How to apply: Email jointheteam+do+hn@fetlife.com with a brief introduction,
2‚Äì3 favorite projects, GitHub/GitLab link, and LinkedIn profile or resume
(PDF).

\---

Stack: MySQL/PostgreSQL, ScyllaDB, Redis, ElasticSearch, Terraform, Google
Cloud, DataDog and more.

Applications: Rails, Vue.js/Typescript, Rust

About Us: FetLife is the largest kinky social network with 12M+ members, 100%
word-of-mouth growth, and billions of daily requests.

jobTitle: iOS/MacOS Engineer, Android Engineer, AI/ML Engineer, Browser Extensions Engineer, Growth Intern, Engineering Intern, Design Intern
descContent:
Puma.tech | Remote-first with PST overlap | iOS/MacOS, Android, Ai/ML, Growth | <https://puma.tech>

Hi all, I‚Äôm Yuriy, founder of Puma.tech. Previously worked as software
engineer & developer advocate at Cloudant (YC S08, Acq. by IBM), Meteor (YC
S11), Parse (YC S11, Facebook/Meta), and explored AI/ML (computer vision for
self-driving cars).

We have two products:

1\. Puma Browser (iOS & Android) ‚Äì browser with built in LLMs & Wallets.
Private by design.

2\. PumaAI app for Mac ‚Äì ChatGPT/Atlas, but with ability to pick different
model providers and fall-back to local-first ones for data privacy.

Open Roles: Eng (iOS/MacOS, Android, Ai/ML, Browser Extensions), Based Social
Media Intern; Internships: Eng, Design, Growth

We‚Äôve raised a few rounds from some of the best builders in crypto and ai:

Protocol Labs (YC S14), Chris Larsen (Ripple), Anatoly Yakovenko (Solana),
Illia Polosukhin (NEAR Protocol), Sridhar Ramaswamy (Snowflake CEO, Neeva,
Greylock), Jason Warner (poolside.ai, ex-GitHub CTO), Don Ho (Orange DAO,
Quantstamp W18), Evil Rabbit (Vercel), John Phamous (SF Compute) and other
amazing builders.

How to Apply: email _careers+hn [at] puma.tech_ with your GitHub, a note on
what you're most proud of building and what you'd like to build next.

Thank you!

Pushscroll | Full-Stack Mobile Engineer (KMP) | REMOTE (GMT-3 to GMT+4)

We make people do push-ups before opening addictive apps - verified through
camera pose detection. Our goal is to replace doomscrolling with exercise.

500k+ downloads, bootstrapped and profitable, very quickly growing.

Looking for someone strong in Kotlin Multiplatform + Compose Multiplatform +
Swift/SwiftUI who works independently, uses AI to ship fast, and can implement
a pixel-perfect Figma design.

Bonus: Supabase, Amplitude, native Android/iOS knowledge (e.g., Screen Time).

Small team, work directly with founders, long-term role. We‚Äôve got big plans
to make Pushscroll the app of the year, and there are a lot of challenging
problems to get there.

Reach out: contact@pushscroll.com

<https://apply.workable.com/modash/j/CC8A1D1FE4/>

Nomi.ai | <https://nomi.ai> | Senior Machine Learning Engineer | Remote (Global) | Full-time | $150k‚Äì$250k + equity

At Nomi, we're building AI companions that form deeply meaningful, humanlike
relationships and immersive roleplaying experiences. With over a million users
growing at ~8% month-over-month, your work directly impacts millions of lives.
Our users tell us we've helped them find self-worth, leave unhealthy
relationships, try therapy, and even save their lives. See countless real user
testimonials here: <https://nomi.ai/spotlight/> and our recent news coverage
here [https://www.cnbc.com/2025/08/01/human-ai-relationships-
love-...](https://www.cnbc.com/2025/08/01/human-ai-relationships-love-
nomi.html)

As an ML Engineer or Senior ML Engineer, you'll lead innovation in large
language model (LLM) post-training, retrieval augmented generation (RAG), and
agentic capabilities, directly shaping how users connect with our AI.

We offer:

    
    
        * Full autonomy to experiment and deploy cutting-edge ML techniques
        * A fully remote, async culture emphasizing results over meetings
        * International team with visa sponsorship available
        * For US employees: 401k (100% match up to 5%), fully covered health insurance, equity
    

Great to haves:

    
    
        * Extensive hands on experience with things such as multinode training, rlhf, knowledge distillation, test time compute, rag, realtime video
        * Up to date with SOTA in LLM post training (would love to hear what research paper you think is or would be most impactful for our roadmap!)
        * Genuine passion for our product, finds the idea of engaging with our community on Discord/Reddit to be a pro (it is a very different experience than developing enterprise software!)
        * A high internal bar for excellence and relentless drive
    

To apply, email alex [at] nomi [dot] ai with HN in the subject line.

40GRID - Full-time Remote | Program Manager

Our mission is to empower field-service companies to grow by modernizing and
automating their business operations. Every company we work with has
unrealized potentials ‚Äî our task is to build the platform that empowers growth
and helps them unlock opportunities.

Email: jobs [at] 40grid.com (no recruiters or agencies, please put HN in
subject line, thanks).

Sequent Tech | Senior Fullstack Engineer, Senior DevOps Engineer | REMOTE (Global) | Full-time | sequentech.io

Senior Fullstack Engineer (Rust + TypeScript/React) Senior DevOps Engineer
(Kubernetes, Infrastructure as Code)

Backed by Tier 1 VCs, we‚Äôve recently launched publicly and are already

Neurotone.ai | Fully Remote | Full-time | neurotone.com Neurotone is revolutionizing auditory training with AI, helping people with hearing disabilities maximize their hearing aids. We‚Äôre a small, fast-moving team of technologists and industry veterans building clinically grounded products that improve lives.

Role: Product Manager (Mobile-First App)

We are looking for a Product Manager to own and evolve our mobile application
experience end-to-end. You will work closely with engineering, design, and
clinical stakeholders to turn user needs into shipped features.

Responsibilities: ‚Ä¢ Own the product roadmap for our mobile app (iOS-first,
cross-platform) ‚Ä¢ Define and prioritize features based on user feedback,
business goals, and technical constraints ‚Ä¢ Write clear product requirements
and acceptance criteria ‚Ä¢ Partner with engineering, QA, and support to deliver
high-quality releases ‚Ä¢ Use product metrics and user behavior to guide
iteration ‚Ä¢ Represent the voice of the user, with empathy for people with
hearing challenges

Requirements: ‚Ä¢ Experience as a Product Manager on a mobile app ‚Ä¢ Strong
communication and organization skills ‚Ä¢ Comfortable working with engineers on
technical topics (APIs, data models, tradeoffs) ‚Ä¢ Experience shipping in
small, iterative teams ‚Ä¢ Interest in accessibility, health tech, or assistive
technology is a plus

Time zone: Candidates must be in time zones no further west than EST; Western
Europe is fine.

Contact: travis AT neurotone.com

Splash Tech| FE/Fullstack Mid-Senior/Senior | Remote( +-2 EU CET) | Full Time | <https://splash.tech/>

We‚Äôre a small UK-based free-to-play gaming company with a distributed EU team,
growing fast after recent success and scaling our platform. We‚Äôre looking for
a FE/Fullstack role, from mid-senior to senior engineer with at least 5+ years
of experience.

Our engineers must be able to think product-first, and take a task from idea
to production, work across the full cycle. You must write your own code, AI
assistance is fine, but you must be able to produce all your work
independently. We value clear thinking and communication, you should be
comfortable sketching simple architecture or flow diagrams (boxes and lines,
nothing formal) to explain your ideas.

You‚Äôll also be asked to write SQL and some Java Controllers that access data.
It‚Äôs ok if you don‚Äôt know Java, but our controllers are written in Java and
you‚Äôll need willingness to learn.

Our stack includes Java, Python, TypeScript, Angular, SQL.

To apply, please send an email to jack[at]splash.tech with the subject
‚ÄúFE/Fullstack Hackernews 2026‚Äù. Please send any git/bitbucket/source-forge
project that represents your coding otherwise I‚Äôll ask you to complete a small
test project.

Sentinel Defense Technologies | Remote (Global) | Full-time | Equity + Deferred Cash

We are building the world's first AI-powered civilian protection platform. Our
mission is to provide military-grade threat intelligence directly to non-
combatants in conflict zones (e.g., Ukraine, Middle East), enabling life-
saving decisions during the critical first 72 hours of a crisis.

We are a Unfunded->Pre-Seed team looking for mission-driven builders who want
to solve hard technical problems (GenAI multi-model verification, geospatial
analytics, offline-first mobile apps) with immediate real-world impact.

*Open Roles (Founder-Level Commitment):* * *Full Stack Developer (System Core):* Python/Django + Frontend. Ship features weekly. * *Backend / DevOps:* CI/CD, secrets management, high-availability architecture. * *AI / ML Systems Engineer:* Multi-model synthesis (Gemini), refusal logic, drift evaluation. * *OSINT / Intelligence Lead:* Define trust tiers, escalation taxonomy. * *Security & Risk Officer:* Threat modeling, audit logging, incident response.

*Compensation (Transparent):* * *Phase 1 (Now):* Sweat Equity only. * *Phase 2 (Pre-Funding):* Equity + Deferred Cash (Contractually tracked, paid on funding). * *Phase 3 (Post-Funding):* Competitive Salary + Equity. * _Note: Strategy & QA roles are Equity Only._

*Tech Stack:* Python, Django, Flutter, MongoDB, Typescript, Dart, HTML, CSS, Shell

*IDE's & AI Models* Antigravity (Opus & Gemini)

*To Apply:* Visit [https://sentinelcivilianriskanalysis.netlify.app/#join-usEma...](https://sentinelcivilianriskanalysis.netlify.app/#join-usEmail) and then email PeterJFrancoIII@gmail.com with your resume/GitHub and a brief note on what you'd ship in week 1.

postTitle: Product Engineer, Backend Engineer, Technical Account Manager
jobTitle: Product Engineer, Backend Engineer, Technical Account Manager
descContent:
PostHog | Full-Time | Product engineers, backend engineers, Technical AMs | REMOTE (all remote) | Hiring GMT-8 to GMT+2

PostHog equips developers to build successful products by combining product
analytics, feature flags, session replay, a data warehouse, CDP and many more.

* we have a public handbook (posthog.com/handbook) if you want to learn how we work, pay and more in complete detail.

* we are growing through more autonomy and transparency not through process.

* we have a ton of scale and a bunch of super interesting technical problems to solve

* we're building 20 more products over the next couple of years, so you could end up building one of those

* public compensation calculator! see immediately what you'd get paid

* we're hiring: product engineers, clickhouse operations engineer, backend engineers, product managers, technical account managers and technical customer success managers.

<https://posthog.com/careers>

Charted Sea | Senior Product & Platform Engineer | REMOTE | Full-time Location: Hong Kong <https://chartedsea.com/about>

Charted Sea is a small, bootstrapped SaaS company helping customers scrape
very complex platforms such as Shopee (a major e-commerce platform in
Southeast Asia). We focus on hard technical problems (anti-bot, browser
automation, fingerprinting, captcha solving).

We are hiring a senior engineer to take ownership of our core platform:
scraper orchestrator, billing & payments, customer dashboard, and parts of our
AI-based captcha tooling. This is a hands-on role with real ownership:
architectural decisions, setting standards, and gradually mentoring other
engineers. The role is very full-stack (infra, backend, frontend).

Stack includes TypeScript (most backend & web), Rust (new backend services,
migration in progress), Go (Android scraper), PyTorch (captcha solvers),
PostgreSQL, Redis, GitHub Actions, Ansible, Ubuntu Linux, bare-metal Hetzner
servers.

We are profitable, demand is growing fast, and engineering bandwidth is the
main bottleneck. Team is small (3 engineers), fully remote, mostly async (we
expect ~4h overlap with UTC+8).

Compensation: $80k‚Äì$120k USD base (depending on experience) + monthly bonus
tied to company revenue (10% of net revenue shared with employees).

Apply by emailing marc.plouhinec@chartedsea.com with a short intro and
CV/GitHub. I'm the founder and will personally read and reply.

Atomic Tessellator | Various | REMOTE (UTC+12) | <https://atomictessellator.com>

We simulate materials at the atomic level for aerospace, defence, nuclear
fusion, and advanced polymers. Our team of four built a near-comprehensive
platform in the last year, we're the first to scale MLIPs across GPUs, and
we're patenting our first new material now.

We're hiring multiple roles at the moment:

Chief Business Officer: <https://atomictessellator.com/careers/chief-business-
officer>

Lead Engineer, Front-end: <https://atomictessellator.com/careers/front-end-
engineer>

We're also taking expressions of interest, as we are always open to hearing
from exceptional people. If you are intellectually curious, highly self-
directed, and comfortable taking full ownership of problems end-to-end, you
should apply, even if there is no current role that fits you exactly.

Design Engineer: [https://atomictessellator.com/careers/designer-
expressions-o...](https://atomictessellator.com/careers/designer-expressions-
of-interest)

Generalist: [https://atomictessellator.com/careers/general-expressions-
of...](https://atomictessellator.com/careers/general-expressions-of-interest)

Computational Materials Scientist:
[https://atomictessellator.com/careers/materials-scientist-
ex...](https://atomictessellator.com/careers/materials-scientist-expressions-
of-interest)

Ideally you should be within +- 4 hours of UTC+12, unless very senior.

FUTO | Austin, TX | Remote | Full Time

FUTO is an organization dedicated to developing, both through in-house
engineering and investment, technologies that frustrate centralization and
industry consolidation. Our work consists of a combination of in-house
engineering projects, targeted investments, generous grants, and multi-media
public education efforts.

Senior Infastructure & Platform Engineer - Immich

Immich is on a mission to provide a secure and private home for your most
precious memories through our high-performance, self-hostable photo and video
backup solution. We are now taking the next step in our journey by building
out our own cloud platform. Our initial cloud offering will be a fully managed
backup service, secured with mandatory end-to-end encryption to ensure our
users retain absolute privacy over their data.

We are seeking a versatile Senior Infrastructure & Platform Engineer who can
work across the full stack of our cloud infrastructure, from bare-metal
servers to the services running on them. This is a unique opportunity
combining hands-on infrastructure work with platform and application-level
development. You‚Äôll be working in a small team to build our infrastructure
from the ground up on our own hardware clusters while also contributing to the
services and tooling that power our cloud offering.

More info is available here: <https://futo.org/jobs/senior-engineer/>

To apply, send your resume and cover letter to jobs at futo dot org.

postTitle: Investor Onboarding Specialist ‚Äì Private Equity Real Estate
jobTitle: Investor Onboarding Specialist ‚Äì Private Equity Real Estate
descContent:
## Description

This role is responsible for ensuring all new and existing investors receive a
seamless, "white-glove" experience during the capital commitment and
investment lifecycle. The **Investor Onboarding Specialist** owns the full
end-to-end workflow, from commitment to funding, ensuring compliance, data
accuracy, and proactive communication. This position is essential for
maintaining strong investor relationships and driving reinvestment velocity.

**Key Responsibilities**

  * **Investor Onboarding Execution:**
    * Own the entire onboarding workflow
    * Coordinate KYC, accreditation, and Blue Sky requirements with third-party compliance partners to ensure all legal and regulatory obligations are met.
    * Process and track wire transfers and capital commitments accurately.
  * **Investor Portal Management (InvestNext):**
    * Ensure portal accuracy, including correct entity mapping and secure documentation storage.
    * Serve as the primary data owner for investor records, capital commitments, and distribution reporting within InvestNext.
    * Track investment lifecycle status per investor and proactively escalate issues to executive leadership.
  * **Client Experience & Relationship Management:**
    * Drive a high-touch, white-glove investor experience that significantly reduces friction and encourages future reinvestment.
    * Track onboarding timelines per investor and per offering to ensure efficiency and speed.
    * Work with CPAs, fund administrators, and operations to maintain accurate investor records for tax and reporting purposes.

## Requirements

**Prior Experience:** 2‚Äì5 years of experience in investor relations, investor
operations, financial services operations, or similar client-facing roles.
Experience in private investments or real estate is a strong plus.

**Systems Experience:** Experience with InvestNext or similar investor portal
software, or the ability to learn systems quickly. Strong proficiency with
task management software (Asana, Monday, ClickUp) and data entry/tracking in
Excel.

**Work Style:**

  * **Exceptionally detail-oriented** and highly organized, with strong follow-through.
  * Possesses an ownership mindset and takes full responsibility for client outcomes.
  * Excellent interpersonal and communication skills, necessary for a white-glove client experience.

###

* * *

Bellota Labs is hiring a Marketing Coordinator to expand our marketing and
content efforts for Upswing Poker, and alongside the team behind ClubWPT Gold,
our flagship product in partnership with the World Poker Tour.

  

This is a high-impact, multi-disciplinary role focused on delivering free
value to poker players, growing our reach, and driving poker players to our
products. Your primary focuses will be social media, content, and email
marketing.

  

If you‚Äôre a hard-worker who is looking for a remote role with ownership,
creativity, autonomy, and a small-team feel, read up on the details and apply
below.

### Responsibilities

    * **Social Media**
    * Collaborate with editors, designers, and creative leads to develop compelling content
    * Engage with players via comments, DMs, and community feedback loops
    * Test and iterate strategies to grow reach, engagement, and player acquisition
    * Stay on top of social and gaming trends to keep content fresh and relevant
    * **Content Coordination**
    * Own the end-to-end process of content development ‚Äî from concept to release ‚Äî for both free and premium video content
    * Support internal and external contributors to ensure deadlines and creative goals are met
    * Coordinate QA reviews to ensure polished output across platforms
    * **Copywriting**
    * Deliver strong copy for social, email, product announcements, web pages, and promotional campaigns
    * Tailor messaging to align with our tone and resonate with poker enthusiasts

  

### Requirements

    * 1+ year experience managing social media accounts 
    * Basic understanding of poker game play (ideally from firsthand playing experience)
    * Strong copywriting skills 
    * A solid eye for design
    * Strong project management skills
    * Self-starter who can manage multiple projects and deadlines
    * The ability to keep up with face-paced communications across multiple platforms
    * Self-starter who can manage multiple projects and deadlines
    * Bonus: Experience in content marketing
    * Bonus: Experience with project management tools
    * Bonus: Familiarity with email marketing 

### Benefits

    * Fully remote role with flexible work hours
    * Daily immersion in poker content, strategy, and community
    * Work closely with a passionate and experienced team, including elite players and industry leaders
    * Full access to ClubWPT Gold features and premium content
    * High autonomy, real impact ‚Äî your ideas will help shape a fast-growing product
    * Opportunity to grow your role as we scale

$60,000 - $75,000 a year

Join **Bellota Labs** and take the lead in driving world-class gaming projects
to success. If you are passionate about innovation, execution, and making an
impact in a fast-growing startup, we would love to hear from you. Your journey
in redefining gaming starts here!

We may use artificial intelligence (AI) tools to support parts of the hiring
process, such as reviewing applications, analyzing resumes, or assessing
responses. These tools assist our recruitment team but do not replace human
judgment. Final hiring decisions are ultimately made by humans. If you would
like more information about how your data is processed, please contact us.

* * *

About Expedock

We are a tech enabled workforce augmentation platform leveraging top 1%
offshore talent and cutting edge technology to enable businesses to unlock
their full potential.

  

Who We Need

We are looking for a tech savvy, creative Social Media Manager to manage a
home improvement client account. The ideal candidate produces eye-catching,
CTA driven content that engages audiences, builds community, and drives leads.
You are experienced, autonomous, and able to own the content strategy and
calendar, providing direction to content creators for video and photo
production.

  
  

What You'll Do:

  * Plan, create, and publish platform specific content for Instagram (Reels/Stories), TikTok, Facebook, and LinkedIn.
  * Develop CTA driven content highlighting home improvement projects, DIY tips, and products.
  * Maintain and manage the social media content calendar, taking strategic ownership of content planning.
  * Produce or oversee the creation of short form videos, graphics, and other multimedia content.
  * Engage with the community by responding to comments, messages, and inquiries promptly.
  * Monitor social trends, home improvement topics, and audience interests to keep content relevant.
  * Track performance metrics and use insights to optimize engagement, conversions, and lead generation.
  * Collaborate with marketing and client teams to align social media content with campaigns, promotions, and email newsletters or other marketing channels.

  

What You Need

  * Portfolio of social media work (examples of content created, campaigns managed, or videos produced). Submission via email to [careers@expedock.com](mailto:careers@expedock.com) is required to progress.
  * C1 English proficiency (written and spoken).
  * 2+ years of experience in social media management or content creation, preferably with lifestyle, home improvement, or design brands.
  * Proven ability to produce high quality short form video content.
  * Proficiency in video editing, posting, and community engagement.
  * Deep understanding of platform algorithms and content best practices for IG, TikTok, and FB (LinkedIn is a plus).
  * Ability to tailor content for each platform (e.g., Reels for IG, text posts for FB).
  * Experience with multi-channel marketing, including email newsletters.
  * Strong attention to detail and ability to manage multiple campaigns independently.
  * Familiarity with social media scheduling tools (Buffer, Later, Hootsuite).
  * Reliable device and high speed internet for remote work

* * *

**Description**  

As a **Brand Ambassador** , you are an essential part of our dynamic team.
Your mission is to represent our client‚Äôs products with passion and expertise.
By building strong relationships, ensuring supplying clients with valuable
feedback and reporting, you significantly contribute to our client‚Äôs success.

  
  
**Responsibilities**  

**1\. Relationship Building:**

  * **Department Managers:** Build and continue fostering positive relationships with department managers.
  * **Client Engagement:** Be the face of our brand during store visits, engaging with key stakeholders.

**2\. Premium Display Locations:**

  * **Strategic Placement:** Secure prime locations within key departments.
  * **Visual Impact:** Ensure our products shine in every aspect, maximizing visibility.

**3\. Execution and Stock Levels:**

  * **Attention to Detail:** Confirm that displays and walls are executed properly, meeting planogram expectations.
  * **Stock Management:** Monitor stock levels and replenish as needed.

**4\. Valuable Insights:**

  * **Call Reports:** Provide detailed feedback through call reports.
  * **Pictures:** Capture visual insights during store visits.

  
  
**Qualifications**  

  * **Excellent Communication Skills:**
    * Articulate and effective communication to engage with department managers and internal managers.
  * **Warm and Approachable:**
    * A friendly demeanor that fosters positive relationships.
  * **Proven Relationship Builder:**
    * Demonstrated ability to establish lasting connections with cosmetic managers.
  * **Professional Appearance and Demeanor:**
    * Represent our brand with professionalism and poise.
  * **Passion for Cosmetics:**
    * Genuine interest in beauty products and industry trends.
  * **Access to Own Vehicle:**
    * Reliable transportation.
  * **Availability:**
    * Able to work Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm.

  
  

* * *

*** Fraud and phishing warning ***

 **_Please apply directly via our volunteering portal/ATS at
https://wevote.applytojob.com/apply. Do not apply via any other job portals,
aggregators, or sites, as your information may not be secure, or the role may
no longer be accepting applications. Thank you_**  
  
 _*About WeVote*  
WeVote is a 100% volunteer-powered, nonpartisan nonprofit that uses technology
to help voters make informed decisions. With 130+ active volunteers and a
national reach‚Äîall on a budget under $50K/year‚Äîwe prove grassroots, mission-
first civic tech can have real impact._  
  
**Join the WeVote Movement**

WeVote has an open volunteer position for a **Fundraiser, Volunteer
Ambassador, for 5 hours or more per week.** You are an experienced
professional with a passion for helping America navigate our current political
environment. This is an opportunity to work remotely with our active team to
help us get ready for multiple upcoming elections. Our ideal volunteer is
passionate about politics and excited to use technology to educate voters and
increase voter turnout. You‚Äôll also gain valuable technical skills, have
opportunities for leadership development, and expand your personal and
professional network.

**About Us**

WeVote is a nonpartisan get-out-the-vote nonprofit startup and a celebrated
[Fast Forward nonprofit technology grantee](https://www.ffwd.org/about).
WeVote is a movement of over 120 active passionate, part-time volunteers
(starting with the founders) who build mobile technologies that will touch and
mobilize millions of voters on Election Day. We believe that many voters are
busy, distracted, and impatient. We have a goal of providing a positive voting
experience that helps people decide how to vote. More information at
[https://WeVote.US](https://wevote.us/?utm_source=jazzhr&utm_medium=referral&utm_campaign=job_ad&utm_id=jazzhrjobad)
or @WeVote on X.

**What You'll Do**

  * Recruit, motivate, and support volunteers who serve as fundraising ambassadors for our organization.
  * Create toolkits, templates, and digital resources volunteers can use to share donation asks across email, social media, and personal networks.
  * Coach and inspire volunteers to confidently make fundraising appeals and tell our story in authentic, mission-centered ways.
  * Coordinate small peer-to-peer fundraising campaigns and community challenges.
  * Collaborate with the Recruitment team to ensure consistent messaging and branding.
  * Recognize and celebrate volunteer fundraising milestones and donor engagement wins.
  * Track outreach, participation, and fundraising progress using CRM tools.
  * Provide feedback and insights to improve future volunteer fundraising programs.

**Who you are: Must haves.**

  * You want to work with an established and successful team. You are committed to strengthening American Democracy.
  * You are striving for personal excellence, and want to do meaningful work that will make a difference.
  * 1‚Äì2 years of experience in fundraising, volunteer coordination, or community engagement (nonprofit experience preferred).
  * Strong interpersonal and communication skills ‚Äî comfortable connecting with diverse audiences.
  * Excellent communication and storytelling ability, with comfort presenting or training small groups.
  * Organized, detail-oriented, and proactive in follow-u
  * Energetic, organized, and motivated by mission-driven work.
  * A willingness to work with and support other volunteers.
  * Familiarity with CRM, email marketing, or fundraising tools a plus.
  * 5+ hours per week during our core team hours M-F 8 a.m. - 6 p.m. PT

**How to apply:**

Submit your resume (at https://wevote.applytojob.com/apply/) and include a
brief note/cover letter to why you are interested in WeVote and helping our
mission.

* * *

### **About the Role  
**

**Stack Influence** is a venture backed marketplace platform that automates
collaborations between eCommerce brands and everyday social media creators. We
are a high-growth, remote-first startup.  
  
Stack Influence is hiring a versatile, data-driven **Digital Marketing
Manager** to join our team, reporting directly to the Head of Growth.

We are looking for someone who has moved past the "novice" phase of Google Ads
and is ready to own B2B campaigns, but who also possesses a wider skillset to
support broader marketing initiatives. As we launch a new website and manage
team coverage, agility is key.

You will primarily focus on Paid Acquisition, but you will also play a key
role in supporting our new website‚Äôs SEO strategy, ensuring content continuity
when needed, and assisting with a variety of marketing initiatives. If you
understand how to drive leads for B2B, but can also speak the language of
eCommerce brands, you will fit right in.

**Salary is between $60K ‚Äì $80K CAD.**  
  

### **Key Responsibilities**

**1\. Google Ads & Paid Media (Primary Focus)**

  * **Campaign Management:** Build, optimize, and scale Google Ads campaigns (Search, Display, and Discovery) with a focus on high-quality B2B lead generation.
  * **Landing Page Optimization:** Collaborate on landing page strategy to improve Quality Scores and Conversion Rates.
  * **Analytics:** Deep dive into Google Analytics 4 (GA4) to track user behavior, attribution, and ROI.
  * **ECommerce Alignment:** Leverage any past experience with eCommerce brands to better understand our target market and craft messaging that resonates with DTC founders and marketing managers.

**2\. SEO & Web Development Support**

  * **New Site Updates:** Assist the team with expansion of our new Webflow website (blog evolution, landing page creation, content/copy updates, etc). You will help ensure SEO best practices are maintained during new site updates.
  * **SEO Tools:** Utilize Ahrefs and Google Search Console to monitor traffic health and identify keyword opportunities.

**3\. Content Operations (Coverage & Support)**

  * **Content Continuity:** Provide backup coverage for our content team. You should be comfortable stepping in to manage the blogging cadence, ad creation, and marketing material development when required.
  * **AI-Driven Workflow:** Utilize AI tools to research topics and draft blog posts, editing them to ensure they meet our quality standards and SEO requirements. Creating AI automations to streamline a variety of marketing initiatives.

**4\. Marketing Operations**

  * **HubSpot CRM:** Assist in tracking leads through the funnel, analyzing & creating reports, working with hubspot forms, etc.
  * **New Marketing Initiatives:** Assist with a variety of different marketing initiatives like newsletter marketing, outbound email marketing campaigns, new ad channels, etc.
  * **Marketing Automations:** Assist with setting up cross software automations with Zapier, implementing new AI marketing automations, and creating streamlined workflows.  
  

### **What We‚Äôre Looking For**

  * **Experience:** 2‚Äì4+ years of digital marketing experience.
  * **Mindset:** Avid learner who is a team player but also can spearhead new initiatives.
  * **B2B Ads Proficiency:** You have run ads for B2B companies before and understand the nuances of lead quality vs. quantity.
  * **SEO Literacy:** You understand the fundamentals of technical SEO well enough to assist with a site migration without tanking rankings.
  * **Tech Stack:**
    * **Must Have:** Google Ads Manager, Google Analytics (GA4), Google Search Console, and AI tool experience (ChatGPT, Perplexity, etc)
    * **Strongly Preferred:** HubSpot, Ahrefs (or Semrush), Webflow, and Zapier.  
  

### **"Nice to Haves" (Bonus Points)**

  * **E-commerce Brand Experience:** Since our clients are primarily e-commerce brands, having experience working  _for_ or  _with_ DTC/E-comm companies is a massive plus.
  * **Influencer Marketing Platform Experience:** Since our clients are looking for influencer marketing services having experience working for an influencer company is a plus.
  * **B2B Marketing Channel Knowledge:** Have experience running PR campaigns, managing a variety of different B2B ad platforms (LInkedin, Meta, Reddit, etc), running social media marketing campaigns, and developing outbound ABM email campaigns.

### **Why Join Stack Influence?**

  * **Scaling Startup:** Stack Influence is a VC-funded startup, one of the leading influencer marketing platforms, and on a mission to allow brands and everyday people to exchange value and creativity without barriers.
  * **Growth Potential:** You will report directly to the Head of Growth and work with the C-Suite giving you a front-row seat to high-level strategy.
  * **Variety:** You won't be siloed into just one button-pushing task. You‚Äôll touch Ads, SEO, content, and a variety of marketing initiatives.
  * **Tools:** We embrace modern workflows (AI, Automation) to make your job more efficient.
  * **Impact:** We are a platform where your work directly correlates to the company‚Äôs revenue. You won't be a cog in a wheel.
  * **Autonomy:** We value results over micro-management. You will have the freedom to test new ideas.
  * **Remote:** We are a fully remote team allowing you to work on your own schedule from anywhere you desire (as long as you are available to coordinate with team schedules).

* * *

Help us build and support [WPML](https://wpml.org/) ‚Äì the leading multilingual
plugin powering 1.5M+ websites.

We‚Äôre looking for smart, curious developers who enjoy solving real problems
and want to grow fast. This role mixes development and support: you learn the
product deeply, help clients, and improve WPML based on what you discover.

### Indicators You're a Great Fit:

  * You have strong PHP experience and are motivated to keep sharpening your skills.

  * Expert in WordPress, including setting up a local dev environment, navigating the admin backend, adjusting settings, and having basic development knowledge.

  * You‚Äôre experienced in debugging issues, tracing root causes, and suggesting meaningful product improvements.

  * Believe in writing tests and clean, reliable code.

  * Enjoy investigating problems and fixing root causes.

  * You‚Äôre fluent in English, and French, German, or Spanish.

  * You communicate clearly and genuinely, and you enjoy helping others.

#### Nice to have experience with:

  * React 

  * MySQL

  * Customer support

### What You'll Do

  * Deliver new features and strengthen existing components.

  * Support WPML clients and solve technical problems.

  * Strengthen your expertise in PHP, WordPress, testing, performance, and modern tooling.

### Why This Role Works Well for Developers

  * Direct connection to real problems: You see issues before they turn into technical debt and can fix them properly.

  * Stronger product intuition: Support cases reveal edge cases, integrations, and workflows you won‚Äôt discover from code alone.

  * Your code has an immediate impact: You‚Äôll build features for one of the most used multilingual solutions in the world and help improve its reliability.

  * You influence the roadmap: What you learn from users feeds directly into better architecture and long-term fixes.

**If you want to learn fast, make a visible impact, and join a global team
that cares about quality ‚Äì apply today, and we‚Äôd love to meet you!**

* * *
