postTitle: Content Engineer, Developer Documentation at LiveKit
jobTitle: Content Engineer, Developer Documentation at LiveKit
descContent:
LiveKit is revolutionizing the AI landscape by providing the essential network
infrastructure that powers multimodal AI interfaces, enabling seamless audio
and visual interactions. Founded in 2021, LiveKit has rapidly grown to support
over 3 Billion calls annually, 200,000+ developers globally, and industry
giants like OpenAI, Salesforce, Spotify, and Meta.

**You'll Thrive at LiveKit if You:**

  * obsessed with making the best product for our customers.

  * are known as the go-to person for tackling tough problems

  * work hard and can build _and_ ship fast

  * focused on polish, detail and quality

  * are a fast learner, frequently picking up new tips, tricks, and skills

The best way to impress us is with thoughtful ways you‚Äôd implement LiveKit,
and potentially tinkering with it üòä

About This Role:

LiveKit is building the modern, open platform for real-time audio and video.
Developers use our SDKs and APIs to add interactive video, voice, and live
media features into their apps. We're used in healthcare, fitness, virtual
events, customer support, gaming, and more ‚Äî anywhere people collaborate or
connect live online.

We‚Äôre looking for a **Content Engineer** with a deep understanding of software
development who is passionate about helping developers succeed through great
documentation and learning resources. This is not just a technical writing
role ‚Äî you‚Äôll be writing real code, testing SDKs, and directly improving our
documentation site alongside our engineering team.

What You'll Do:

    * **Author and maintain high-quality developer documentation** , including tutorials, SDK guides, and API references that serve both novice and advanced developers.

    * **Write and run code** ‚Äî test LiveKit‚Äôs SDKs and APIs (JavaScript, Swift, Kotlin, etc.) to create working examples and verify correctness of documentation.

    * **Extend our documentation infrastructure** , improving the site UX, build pipeline, search-ability, or layout to make the docs more useful and maintainable.

    * **Improve and maintain written content across our open source repos** , including READMEs, examples, and package documentation to ensure clarity and consistency.

    * **Collaborate closely with engineering and product** to understand new features and help launch them with strong supporting materials.

    * **Own content quality** by identifying and fixing inconsistencies, outdated references, or unclear explanations.

    * Help **shape the future** of our learning content by proposing new formats, interactive examples, or educational tools to better serve the LiveKit developer community.

You Might be a Good Fit if You:

      * Have **strong writing skills** and a knack for explaining complex technical topics clearly and concisely.

      * Are a **practicing developer** ‚Äî comfortable working in multiple programming languages and familiar with web application development.

      * Have experience with or interest in **real-time communication, video streaming, or multimedia APIs**.

      * Have contributed to or maintained **technical documentation** , developer blogs, or tutorial content in a professional or open-source setting.

Bonus Points if You:

        * Have built or contributed to documentation tooling or developer portals.

        * Have a portfolio of writing samples, such as published tutorials, API guides, or technical blog posts.

**Our Commitments to You**

### **We offer**

          * An opportunity to build something truly impactful to the world

          * Contribute to open source alongside world-class engineers

          * Competitive salary and equity package

          * Health, dental, and vision benefits

          * Flexible vacation policy

Superside is looking for an AI Specialist to push the boundaries of what‚Äôs
possible when creativity meets technology. In this role, your main focus will
be helping our Sales team win new business through imaginative, high-impact
creative showcases that demonstrate what‚Äôs possible with Superside. You‚Äôll
also work with the Marketing team to explore new ways AI can elevate our
campaigns, storytelling, and creative workflows.

  

You‚Äôll sit within the Marketing team and partner closely with Sales, strategy,
and creative leaders across time zones. You‚Äôll be the bridge between creative
craft and AI innovation, turning ideas into visual stories that inspire
customers and show the power of pairing AI with creative expertise.

Superside is looking for an AI Specialist to push the boundaries of what‚Äôs
possible when creativity meets technology. In this role, your main focus will
be helping our Sales team win new business through imaginative, high-impact
creative showcases that demonstrate what‚Äôs possible with Superside. You‚Äôll
also work with the Marketing team to explore new ways AI can elevate our
campaigns, storytelling, and creative workflows.

  

You‚Äôll sit within the Marketing team and partner closely with Sales, strategy,
and creative leaders across time zones. You‚Äôll be the bridge between creative
craft and AI innovation, turning ideas into visual stories that inspire
customers and show the power of pairing AI with creative expertise.

### What You'll Do

* Partner with Sales to create quick-turn creative showcases, prototypes, and visual examples that bring Superside‚Äôs AI-enhanced capabilities to life.
* Join customer conversations to help translate creative ideas and AI potential into inspiring, practical solutions.
* Collaborate with Marketing to bring AI thinking into campaigns, social content, and storytelling that shows what creativity looks like in the age of AI.
* Explore and experiment with generative AI tools for image, video, and design to enhance speed, craft, and creativity.
* Develop and demonstrate repeatable AI workflows that help scale creative quality across teams.
* Translate technical possibilities into visual stories and creative outputs that feel strategic, useful, and human.
* Share learnings, trends, and best practices to help the broader Superside team stay ahead of the curve on AI-driven creativity.
* Advocate for thoughtful, ethical, and human-centred use of AI across all creative work.

### What You'll Need To Succeed

* 4+ years of experience in design, art direction, or creative leadership within a digital-first or agency environment.
* A strong portfolio that shows conceptual thinking, creative storytelling, and examples of AI-enhanced or technology-led work.
* Proven experience creating visual narratives that connect business value with creative impact.
* Strong collaboration skills with the ability to work across marketing, creative, and sales functions.
* Curiosity and confidence in experimenting with new AI tools and workflows.
* Excellent communication skills with the ability to make complex ideas feel simple and exciting.
* A proactive mindset and passion for exploring how creativity and technology can work together.
* A grounded, collaborative approach that values curiosity, clarity, and craft in equal measure.

*Looking for some tips on how to improve your portfolio? We've got you covered!<https://careers.superside.com/building-a-standout-portfolio>

  

**Why Join us?**

  

Superside's vision is to create equal opportunities globally by accelerating
the world‚Äôs transition to online work. With that in mind, we're building a
fully remote company that attracts people where they are.

  

**Remote-first. Customer-led.**

Remote isn‚Äôt just a perk; it‚Äôs how we deliver better for customers. We are
fully committing to our customers by hiring top talent and collaborating
seamlessly across time zones.

**Global team, local impact.**

Join a community of 60+ nationalities working across time zones, cultures, and
disciplines, all aligned on doing great work for great brands.

**High performance, low ego.**

Work in a fast-paced, high-trust environment where feedback is direct, growth
is constant, and kindness leads collaboration.

**Impact meets opportunity.**

We‚Äôre in the sweet spot ‚Äî big enough to be stable, small enough for you to
shape what‚Äôs next. Your ideas will matter here.

**Grow fast. Lead well.**

You‚Äôll gain mentorship, take on real responsibility, and grow your career
while helping us disrupt a global industry.

  

**About Superside**

  

Superside is the leading AI-powered creative company that quickly and cost-
effectively enhances in-house functions. We help over 500 ambitious brands get
great creative concepts done at scale. Built to be an extension

of in-house teams, we unbottleneck marketing and creative teams so they can
move faster and drive more reliable creative performance.

Superside is a fully remote company with over 700 team members working across
60+ countries and 13 timezones.

  

Learn more at [superside.com](http://superside.com/)

  

**Diversity, Equity and Inclusion**

  

We‚Äôre an equal-opportunity company. All applicants will be considered
regardless of ethnicity, appearance, religion, gender identity, sexual
orientation, national origin, veteran or disability status.

postTitle: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer, CRM at Circle
jobTitle: Senior Full-Stack Software Engineer, CRM at Circle
descContent:
### About Us

Circle is building the world‚Äôs leading all-in-one platform for online
communities. We make it possible for creators, coaches, educators, and
businesses to bring together their audience with engaging discussions, live
streams, events, chat, courses, and payments ‚Äî all in one place, all under
their own brand.

We‚Äôre proud to be a fully remote company of around 200 (and growing!) team
members from 30+ countries around the world. We seek exceptional individuals
around the world, set them up to do the best work of their lives, and in turn,
create a meaningful impact in their own lives. We don't track hours, but we do
manage for high expectations very closely. We collaborate across time zones,
are highly async, and like to document a lot.

Twice a year, we bring the whole company together in beautiful places around
the world for our company offsites. So far, we‚Äôve hosted offsites in Turkey,
Portugal, Mexico, Thailand, Colombia, Italy, Ireland, and more, with still
more to come!

Check out our [Careers](https://careers.circle.so/) page for more about
working at Circle.

### About the role

We're looking for a Senior Full-stack engineer to join our CRM/Workflow team
as we aim to make Circle the top choice for creator/brand-led communities.
You'll be working on features related to CRM, member sign-up/authentication,
workflow automations and helping our members connect with each other.

In this role, you will partake in all stages of the development lifecycle,
from initial task definition to final deployment. As a senior engineer, you'll
break down large epics into actionable tasks, follow through with development
and testing, review PRs, push updates to production, and gradually release
behind feature flags. Your responsibilities will also include bug-fixing and
continuous improvement of the codebase. This role requires a high level of
technical proficiency and a strong understanding of software development best
practices.

### What you‚Äôll be doing

  * Work autonomously on a product built in Ruby on Rails backend and React front-end.
  * Build critical features and improvements for our web app, with a product-first mindset.
  * Work closely with Circle's leaders throughout the feature design process.
  * Work closely with our designers to create a world-class user experience.
  * Foster a bias for action, prioritizing speed of iteration without compromising on the quality of code or user experience.

### What you‚Äôll need to be successful

  * Strong alignment with our values, [find our values on our career page](https://www.notion.so/Circle-Careers-223a15ea312c4922b793593d07add7fe?pvs=21) if you haven‚Äôt read up on them yet.
  * 6+ years experience working as a full-stack engineer on complex web applications.
  * Strong proficiency in Ruby on Rails, MySQL/Postgresql, ReactJS, TypeScript, CSS/SCCS, TailwindCSS. 
    * Familiarity with both frontend and backend is necessary, but a high degree of proficiency in both is not a requirement. You should be able to individually build most small to medium features end-to-end across the stack, but you can excel in one over the other.
  * A desire to work in an environment which values speed of iteration and individual autonomy, while also embracing personal accountability and the ability to collaborate effectively as part of a dynamic team.
  * Motivation to understand the business, our users, their requirements, and to deliver results.
  * Comfortable in a fast-paced environment with a certain level of ambiguity.
  * Great communication skills both in writing and verbal/oral (English).
  * Adaptable with the ability to change direction quickly if necessary.
  * Familiar with agile software development principles.
  * Should be able to lead a complex project end to end with judgment and an attention to detail when it comes to architectural, product, design, and process decisions, your judgment should inspire a high level of trust within the team.
  * Experience working on a fully distributed remote team.

### Bonus points

  * Experience with Elasticsearch / Sidekiq / Kafka / LLM APIs / Graph Databases / Data Science.
  * Previous experience working with community platforms.
  * Experience working on CRM, workflow automations solutions, recommendation systems or in the creator space.
  * Experience at a fast-growing start-up.
  * A track record of picking up new technologies and skills as you ship high-quality code.

### $130,000 - $140,000 USD per year

_The cash compensation range shown is a starting point. In addition to equity,
benefits and perks, your cash compensation is subject to an annual review and
increase on a once per year basis._

### The fun stuff

  * Fully remote: work from anywhere in the world!
  * Autonomy and trust to do your job: we care about outcomes over everything else.
  * Paid time away: all employees are given 35 days of PTO annually. We also offer a paid sabbatical after 5 years.
  * Generous U.S. benchmarked compensation and startup equity no matter where you are in the world.*
  * Awesome medical coverage with 100% coverage for you and your family, or medical reimbursement options where applicable!*
  * Parental leave for parents expanding their family, or just starting one.
  * Home office stipend to help you get up and running.
  * Learning & development stipend to help you level up your professional skills.
  * Annual bonus potential for roles that don't already receive variable income or commission.
  * Company retreats: Twice a year, the Circle team gets together for a fully paid company retreat in incredible places around the world! We‚Äôve had past retreats in Colombia, Portugal, and Mexico, with more planned on the horizon.
  * Check out our [Careers](https://careers.circle.so/) page for more.

*_Your role, location and unique circumstance may affect this._

### Diversity, Equity & Inclusion

As a fully-remote international company, diversity is baked into our DNA.
Here‚Äôs how our CEO, Sid Yadav, frames our hiring mission: ‚Äúlet‚Äôs find talent
in underserved and under-represented corners of the world, set them up to do
the best work of their lives, and in turn, change their life.‚Äù To achieve this
hiring mission, we offer competitive U.S. benchmarked compensation no matter
where someone‚Äôs located in the world, and we proactively seek candidates who
expand representation of backgrounds, cultures and lived experiences in our
teams.

### Equal Employment Opportunity

Circle is an equal opportunity employer and as such, we do not discriminate on
the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity,
national origin, age, disability, or any other characteristic protected by
applicable laws. If you require any accommodations during the recruitment
process, please let us know and we will work with you to meet your needs.

### How We Use Candidate Data

At Circle, we are committed to protecting your personal information. As a job
applicant, the personal data you provide to us is collected and processed in
accordance with the **General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR)** in the EU
and the **California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA)**. This notice outlines the
types of personal information we collect, the purpose for collecting it, and
your rights.

**Information We Collect:** We collect the following categories of personal
information from job applicants:

  * Contact information (such as name, email address, phone number)
  * Employment history and qualifications
  * Education history
  * References and any other information you choose to share with us during the application process

**Purpose of Collection:** We collect this information for the following
purposes:

  * To assess your qualifications and suitability for the position
  * To communicate with you during the recruitment process
  * To comply with legal and regulatory obligations

**Your Rights Under GDPR and CCPA:** You have the following rights regarding
your personal information:

  * The right to request access to the personal information we hold about you.
  * The right to request the deletion of your personal information, subject to certain legal exceptions.
  * The right to opt out of the sale of your personal information (Note: We do not sell personal information).

For more information about how we handle your personal data or to exercise
your rights, please refer to our full [Privacy
Policy](https://circle.so/privacy).

By submitting your application, you acknowledge that you have read and
understood this privacy notice.

# Mission

Commercial Real Estate (CRE) is the world‚Äôs largest asset class. Annual
transaction volume is 10% of GDP, yet the industry remains archaic because
data is locked in a black box of complexity. We are breaking that box open and
transforming CRE into an AI-native asset class.

# Traction

In just six months, we went from 0 code and 0 revenue to signing customers
with billions of AUM. Our product vision is clear, and we are delivering a
solution that truly solves CRE investors‚Äô pain points.

# Hiring Positions

## Full-Stack Engineer

  * Own the infrastructure and UI that power high-value investment decisions.
  * Design scalable data pipelines and cloud architecture.
  * Tackle complex business logic with domain-driven design.
  * Experience with typescript / react / postgres / AWS

## UIUX/Design Engineer

  * Empathize with user experience
  * Provide critical input to guide product decision
  * Experience with Figma / StoryBook / Typescript / React

## Who are you:

You build things for fun, obsess over craft, and have a lot of product ideas.
You have proven experience shipping production software to solve ambiguous
business problems. You have experience with end-to-end NLP/IE and complex data
extraction.

**Job Summary**

We are seeking a Paid Media Specialist to manage, optimize, and scale paid
advertising campaigns across Google Ads and Meta (Facebook/Instagram)
platforms. This role plays a key part in driving conversions, leads, and
revenue through strategic and analytical performance marketing.

**Key Responsibilities**

  * Plan, launch, and manage paid advertising campaigns on Google Ads (Search, Display, YouTube, Performance Max) and Meta Ads (Facebook & Instagram)
  * Research target audiences, keywords, and competitors to improve campaign effectiveness
  * Continuously monitor, analyze, and optimize campaigns to achieve KPIs such as CPA, ROAS, CTR, CPC, and conversion rate
  * Develop and test ad creatives (copy, visuals, formats) in collaboration with content and design teams
  * Manage advertising budgets efficiently to maximize ROI
  * Set up and maintain tracking systems using Google Analytics, Google Tag Manager, Meta Pixel, and conversion tracking
  * Prepare weekly and monthly performance reports with insights and optimization recommendations
  * Stay updated with the latest digital advertising trends, platform updates, and best practices
  * Work closely with internal teams to align paid media strategies with overall marketing goals

**Requirements**

  * Bachelor‚Äôs degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field (preferred)
  * 1‚Äì3+ years of experience in Paid Media / Digital Advertising
  * Hands-on experience with Google Ads and Facebook/Instagram Ads
  * Strong analytical skills and data-driven mindset
  * Familiar with tracking, reporting, and performance measurement tools
  * Ability to manage multiple campaigns and meet deadlines
  * Good communication and teamwork skills

**Nice to Have**

  * Experience in lead generation or e-commerce campaigns
  * Knowledge of A/B testing, remarketing, and funnel optimization
  * Experience managing medium to large advertising budgets
  * Google Ads or Meta Blueprint certifications

**Benefits**

  * Competitive salary with performance-based incentives
  * Opportunity to work with diverse clients and industries
  * Fast-growing digital advertising environment
  * Career development and learning opportunities

**How to Apply**

Please send your **CV** to: **hr****@dolphindigitalmarketing.com**  
**Subject:** Paid Media Specialist ‚Äì Full Name

postTitle: AI / ML Engineer, Senior UX/UI Designer
jobTitle: AI / ML Engineer, Senior UX/UI Designer
descContent:
Root Sustainability | AI / ML Engineer, Senior UX/UI Designer | REMOTE / The Netherlands (or hybrid) | Full-time | Seed-stage + equity

We‚Äôre Root Sustainability. We help companies understand the environmental
footprint of what they produce, starting from messy, incomplete operational
data. Think tens of millions of purchase order lines, vague product
descriptions, complex supply chains, messy ERP exports, and sustainability
logic that does not fit neatly into spreadsheets. Our goal is to turn all of
that into auditable, high-granularity insights that feel clear and usable.

We‚Äôve recently closed a EUR 1M seed round and are growing the team across both
product design and AI. We are building foundational systems, not wrappers, and
we are looking for people who want to own real problems end to end.

Roles:

AI / ML Engineer

You will take the lead on everything AI inside the product. This is a hands-on
role: designing, building, evaluating, and deploying LLM-powered features end
to end. You will work closely with our engineering team, but you will own the
AI direction from prototype to production.

Senior UX/UI Designer

You will own UX/UI end to end: research, flows, wireframes, prototypes, and
polished interfaces that make complex sustainability domains feel obvious. You
work closely with product and engineering as a partner, shaping what we build
next.

What you will do (AI / ML):

Design domain-specific inference pipelines for environmental data.

Make LLM outputs stable, traceable, and reproducible.

Build structured reasoning systems, not just chat.

Use embeddings and semantic similarity to match product descriptions to impact
datasets.

Evaluate models for accuracy, hallucinations, and bias.

Deploy and operate LLM workloads on AWS.

Integrate AI outputs into a Python and Postgres platform.

What you will do (UX/UI):

Lead design for key features: mapping, dashboards, workflows.

Turn fuzzy sustainability problems into clear, user-centered interfaces.

Build prototypes and run lightweight user testing.

Maintain and evolve a design system in Figma.

Ship frequently with engineers, not just hand off specs.

You should apply if (AI / ML):

You have 3 to 5+ years experience in software and or ML engineering.

You are strong in Python with hands-on LLM or NLP experience.

You have deployed AI systems in production on AWS or similar.

You think in systems and pipelines, not just prompts.

You care about evaluation, monitoring, and reproducibility.

You have a product mindset and optimize for clarity and user value.

You should apply if (UX/UI):

You have around 5+ years experience in UX/UI with a strong portfolio.

You are pragmatic: clarity over trends, iteration over perfection.

You thrive in early-stage environments with shifting priorities.

You know design systems, user research, and can defend decisions.

Bonus: data visualization experience, sustainability interest, accessibility
skills.

Constraints:

Authorized to work in the EU or able to work as a contractor.

Availability overlaps with 10:00 to 16:00 CET.

Perks:

Competitive salary with stock options.

Remote-friendly or hybrid with occasional meetups.

Unlimited vacation days.

Direct impact on product direction and core systems.

Small, kind, motivated team solving hard problems together.

How to apply:

AI / ML Engineer: <https://root-sustainability.homerun.co/ai-ml-engineer>

Senior UX/UI Designer: <https://root-sustainability.homerun.co/senior-ux-ui-
designer>

We‚Äôre looking for a Full-Stack Engineer for a full-time, long-term role.
You‚Äôll work closely with the founder on SEO-driven systems and infrastructure.
This role requires ownership and accountability, with responsibility for
building and maintaining systems end-to-end.

**About SerpNames**  
SerpNames is an SEO-focused company specializing in aged and expired domains.
We help businesses build search presence using domains with real history and
authority.

**What we‚Äôre looking for**

  * 5+ years of full-stack development experience

  * Experience with VPS hosting (Vultr, DigitalOcean, or similar)

  * Hands-on experience with Cloudflare (redirects, security, Workers preferred)

  * Experience building custom applications, APIs, scrapers, and IP-based logic

  * Ability to take ownership, work independently, and solve problems without micromanagement

**SEO experience (preferred)**

  * Experience with SEO-driven projects or companies

  * Basic understanding of expired domains, Archive.org, and WordPress

  * Familiarity with Core Web Vitals and Google Search Console

  * SEO experience is a plus, but not mandatory if you‚Äôre technically strong and willing to learn

# **About Dex**

[https://dex.camera](https://dex.camera?utm_source=chatgpt.com)

Dex is a startup focused on **AI √ó children‚Äôs language learning**. We build
**Dex Camera** , an AI-powered learning camera designed for global markets ‚Äî
turning the real world into language-learning material. Kids learn naturally
through **taking photos, exploring, and storytelling** in real-life contexts,
instead of passively consuming content on screens.

Dex Camera is already live in international markets, with a **4.8 / 5 user
rating** , and has received multiple recognitions including the **CES
Innovation Awards 2026**.

We‚Äôre a small, high-impact team, and every person matters. Each team member
participates in shaping the product and is accountable for their decisions and
outcomes.

![dex](https://www.ces.tech/media/bb1b1kyg/v2_2026_dex-
thelanguagelearningcamera-copy-3-landscape-min-
medium.png?width=2000&height=1333&format=webp&quality=80)

# **Role 1: Senior Web Developer**

**Focus:** Marketing Site + Content Tools

**Location:** Shenzhen (Hybrid)

**Type:** Full-time

## **What you‚Äôll do**

You will own two major areas (both critical):

### **1) Marketing Site**

  * Build and continuously optimize the company website, landing pages, campaign pages, brand pages, and purchase-related pages 
  * Focus on performance, SEO, accessibility, and conversion ‚Äî not just visual polish 
  * Work closely with marketing and design to ship fast, validate quickly, and iterate continuously

### **2) Content / Productivity Tools**

  * Build internal tools for content and operations teams to improve content creation and publishing efficiency 
  * Use **Web technologies + Python** to build content tools, automation workflows, and lightweight services 
  * Leverage **AI capabilities** (content generation, data processing, automation, etc.) to continuously improve team productivity and workflows

You will be involved in technical decisions and solution design ‚Äî not just
executing line-by-line requirements.

## **What we‚Äôre looking for**

  * Senior-level web engineer (5+ years of experience, or clearly equivalent capability) 
  * Strong web fundamentals and familiarity with modern stacks (React / Next.js / Astro / Vue ‚Äî stack is flexible) 
  * Solid **Python** experience ‚Äî able to independently build scripts, tools, or simple services 
  * Strong engineering judgment around code quality, performance, and maintainability; able to push better engineering practices 
  * **Basic spoken English** for day-to-day work communication 
  * High ownership: able to drive progress and deliver results even when requirements are incomplete 
  * Comfortable using **AI tools** to boost productivity (e.g., ChatGPT, Claude Code, Cursor, etc.)

## **Nice to have**

  * Experience in Marketing / Growth / CMS / Content Platform 
  * Hands-on experience systematically improving content or engineering workflows with AI 
  * Experience building for international users or global products

## **What we offer**

  * Hybrid working model, outcome-driven, no clock-in culture 
  * Small team, high ownership ‚Äî your work directly impacts the product and the business 
  * An engineering culture that encourages AI + automation for real productivity gains 
  * Competitive compensation and strong growth opportunities

* * *

# **Role 2: Content Operations**

**Focus:** Children‚Äôs content √ó Aesthetic/art background √ó AI content
generation  
**Location:** Shenzhen (Hybrid)  
**Type:** Full-time

## **What this role is about**

This is a cross-functional role at the intersection of **content + product +
AI**.  
You won‚Äôt just ‚Äúproduce content‚Äù‚Äî you will help define what kids **see, hear,
and learn** inside Dex, and build a content system that can scale and evolve.

Your work will center around three areas:

### **1) Children‚Äôs Content Planning & Production**

  * Produce content for children‚Äôs language learning (interactive prompts, stories/tasks, contextual expressions, etc.) 
  * Turn learning goals into content experiences that kids can understand and actually want to engage with 
  * Collaborate with product, design, and AI teams to refine content presentation and pacing

### **2) AI Content Generation & Optimization (Core Skill)**

  * Deeply use AI tools to generate **multimedia content** , primarily **images and audio**
  * Design and maintain prompts, rules, and workflows to make outputs more stable and aligned with children‚Äôs expression and the brand tone 
  * Continuously evaluate and iterate content quality ‚Äî making AI outputs feel more like they come from ‚Äúa creator who truly understands kids‚Äù 
  * Edit and refine AI-generated outputs using tools like **Photoshop or other creative software** when needed

### **3) Content Operations & Quality Control**

  * Own content quality, style consistency, and child-appropriateness (readability, engagement, guidance style, etc.) 
  * Build scalable production and management processes ‚Äî not just a one-time content dump

## **What we‚Äôre looking for**

  * Background in **children‚Äôs content / illustration / art / design / education** (any one or a combination) 
  * A solid understanding of how children express themselves, how they learn, and what appeals to them (what attracts them, where they get stuck) 
  * Strong AI content generation capability: familiar with and willing to deeply use AI tools to improve efficiency and quality 
  * Proficiency with **Photoshop or similar tools** for editing and cleanup 
  * Strong sense of ownership: willing to take long-term responsibility for content outcomes, not just completing tasks 
  * **Basic English** for reading and simple communication 
  * Strong collaborator: able to work with product/design/engineering so content becomes part of the product experience 
  * Experience with Prompt Engineering or AI workflow design (reusable, iterative systems)

## **Nice to have**

  * Experience with picture books, interactive content, children‚Äôs education products, toys/games 
  * Experience with multilingual / international children‚Äôs content 
  * Experience building content standards, content QA, or content workflow systems

## **Why this role matters**

  * What you create directly shapes how children learn and experience the product 
  * You‚Äôre not ‚Äúfilling a content library‚Äù ‚Äî you‚Äôre shaping the product itself 
  * You‚Äôll help define early rules and standards for the AI content system, not just maintain it later

## **What we offer**

  * Hybrid working model, outcome-driven 
  * Deep collaboration with product, AI, and engineering 
  * A team culture that values taste and judgment, and encourages fast experimentation and iteration 
  * Competitive compensation and strong growth opportunities

* * *

# **Role 3: Operations & Customer Experience Manager**

**Focus:** **Location:** Shenzhen (Hybrid)  
**Type:** Full-time

## **What this role is about**

We‚Äôre looking for a full-time **Operations & Customer Experience Manager** to
help run the core of the company.

This role sits at the **center of the Dex product experience** ‚Äî where
customers, operations, and the product all meet. You‚Äôll contribute from day
one by owning customer conversations, improving how we support families, and
building the processes that allow the company to scale.

This is a hands-on, ownership-driven role. You‚Äôll take real responsibility,
solve real problems, and help shape how an AI startup operates behind the
scenes. For the right person, this role offers significant growth and long-
term opportunity.

### **What You‚Äôll Own**

  * Own customer conversations end to end, responding to parents with empathy, clarity, and confidence 

  * Actively refine and improve customer response macros over time based on real customer interactions 

  * Use **Zendesk** to manage tickets, categorize issues, and maintain clean workflows 

  * Use **Shopify** to investigate orders, shipments, and customer history when resolving issues

  * Own operational workflows related to returns, exchanges, lost packages, and chargebacks (we‚Äôll teach you Dex‚Äôs specific policies) 

  * Design and document repeatable processes so customer and operations issues are handled consistently 

  * Track recurring issues and surface patterns, risks, and insights to leadership 

  * Take ownership of cross-functional projects across logistics, content launches, and international operations, working closely with the core team

###

### **What We‚Äôre Looking For**

  * Prior experience working directly with customers or a user community (customer support, CX, community management, operations, or similar) 
  * Comfortable owning customer conversations and making judgment calls in real time 
  * Experience using **Zendesk** (or a similar helpdesk tool) 
  * Experience using **Shopify** (or a similar e-commerce platform) 
  * Strong written communication skills with a warm, calm, and confident tone 
  * Organized, systems-oriented, and motivated to improve how things work 
  * Strong interest in startups and early-stage environments 
  * Excellent English written and verbal communication skills

Role:  
We're hiring a Senior Marketing Manager - Paid Ads.  
Highly Competitive Salary:

\- $100k-$500k USD yearly.  
\- Equity and large upside based on performance is available and negotiable.
Based on ROAS and perceived future leverage.

What You'll Do:

\- Own the full funnel (TOF/MOF/BOF) across all paid ads platforms  
\- Find the arbitrage opportunities - Such as Rumble ads, the push/pop
networks, the weird corners of the internet where CPMs are still cheap  
\- Turn "we don't have a creative" into "we have 47 variations in testing"  
\- Plan and outline video and static creative that makes people stop scrolling
and start clicking  
\- Manage a team of editors who will execute your unhinged creative visions  
\- Make numbers go up

Candidate Requirements:

\- 8+ hours daily in ad dashboards and scrolling to finds creatives (you check
Meta Ads Manager before your texts)

Preferred Skillsets:

\- Lucky  
\- Has lost at least $10k of someone else's money learning what doesn't work  
\- Can explain the difference between broad and lookalike targeting to a child
or a CEO  
\- Meta, TikTok, Google SEM/DV360, Snapchat, Pinterest - you've bled budget on
all of them  
\- Knows what push/pop ads are and isn't scared  
\- Has opinions about landing page load times  
\- Can spot a winning hook in the first 0.3 seconds  
\- Comfortable with platforms that don't have "established best practices" yet  
\- Experience scaling something from $0 to "we need to talk about our credit
limit"  
\- If you've ever made a UGC-style ad that outperformed a $50k production,
mention it  
\- Willing to test on platforms your friends have never heard of

Location:

Remote - Anywhere in US/EU/Others feel free to apply  
Banned locations: Agencies

If you're unsure whether you're qualified, that's a good sign, apply.  
zach@acebet.com or @zachsidwell on TG

post completely (#RNDcuMTEuNDIuMTE4). This is a feature to avoid fake spam
applicants. Companies can search these words to find applicants that read this
and instantly see they're human.

postTitle: Sales Development Representative (Outbound & Inbound | Fully Remote | Full-Time) at Passion.io
jobTitle: Sales Development Representative (Outbound & Inbound | Fully Remote | Full-Time) at Passion.io
descContent:
### Where Conversations Turn Into Conversions üöÄ

**Talk to creators. Open doors. Build pipeline that actually closes.**

You know that moment when a conversation clicks - when curiosity turns into
trust, and trust turns into opportunity?

That‚Äôs your zone.

This role isn‚Äôt about spraying messages and hoping something sticks.  
It‚Äôs about real conversations, sharp qualification, and opening the right
doors for our closers to walk through.

If outbound doesn‚Äôt scare you (it energizes you), you‚Äôre creator-economy
savvy, and you love the chase as much as the win - keep reading.

**If picking up the phone feels natural (and closing the loop feels even
better)‚Ä¶ Yeah. You‚Äôre going to like this one. üòè**

### üí° The Part Where Things Get Really Interesting

At Passion.io, creators come to us with big goals: launch apps, scale their
coaching, build real businesses ‚Üí without code.

Your mission? **Be the first human voice they connect with.** The one who
listens, qualifies, challenges, and uncovers whether Passion is truly the
right next step for them.

You‚Äôll sit right at the top of our revenue engine - owning**inbound ‚ûï
outbound** , feeding high-quality opportunities into our Account Executives‚Äô
calendars, and directly shaping the health of our sales pipeline.

**This role blends:**

  * High-volume outbound hustle
  * Smart inbound qualification
  * Strong discovery instincts
  * And a very human approach to selling

Fast-moving. High standards. Big upside. ‚ù§Ô∏è‚Äçüî•

### ‚ö°Your Day-to-Day (aka what you‚Äôll actually be doing)

  * Kick off each morning with a **sales stand-up** \- status checks, pipeline momentum, and win celebrations
  * Own **inbound** conversations via the **HubSpot inbox**
  * Run **outbound** across **calls, SMS, email, and social** to create new opportunities
  * **Book** qualified meetings directly onto **AE calendars**
  * Run **discovery calls** & Passion Success Calls to **assess fit, readiness, and buying intent**
  * **Assist AE's** with follow-ups and momentum-driving actions
  * **Proactively** **communicate** insights, objections, and context to **help deals move faster**
  * **Qualify** opportunities cleanly and p**ass them forward** with clarity and confidence  

**üí• Success in this role looks like:**  
Seeing opportunity ‚Üí qualifying it properly ‚Üí advancing it forward -
consistently growing pipeline and helping the entire sales team win.

**Requirements**

### üéí Your Starter Pack for Success

**The Essentials You Already Rock:**

  * **2+ years experience** as an SDR / Sales Setter
  * Proven track record generating **qualified outbound** **appointments** that close
  * Experience in **SaaS, Coaching, or the Creator Economy**
  * Comfortable handling **high-volume outbound** (100+ touch points / day baseline)
  * Confident making a **high volume of outbound calls**
  * Friendly, professional, but firm when needed
  * Naturally inquisitive - you ask great questions and actually listen

**Bonus XP ‚¨ÜÔ∏è That‚Äôll make us very happy:**

  * Creator economy experience selling **high-ticket coaching or programs**
  * Consistently setting **3+ qualified outbound meetings per day**
  * Experience driving opportunities with **$15k+ TCV**
  * Strong soft skills - you know how to connect, challenge, and guide
  * Hungry, competitive, and motivated by performance (‚Äúshark energy,‚Äù but human ü¶à)

**‚ú® How You Move (Your Sales Mojo)**

  * Confident communicator who connects fast
  * Curious, sharp, and solution-oriented
  * Resilient - rejection doesn‚Äôt rattle you
  * Organized and disciplined with pipeline hygiene
  * Thrives in momentum-driven, performance-focused environments
  * Loves the chase and the craft of selling

**üîç Fine print: Ability and willingness to work in EST or PST hours are
essential**

**Benefits**

### ‚ù§Ô∏è The Passion.io Experience: What We Do & How We Work

At Passion.io, we‚Äôre on a mission to empower creators to build and monetize
their own mobile apps - without coding. Our platform lets **15,000+ creators
launch their own mobile apps** and teach their passion - **no code, no hassle,
just impact**. Over **200,000** users (and counting!) are learning through the
apps they‚Äôve built. You‚Äôll be working inside a fast-moving, **fully-remote**
crew spread across the globe, passionate about the creator economy, rapid
growth, and building tools that change lives.

**Here‚Äôs what makes working with us, well‚Ä¶ kinda awesome ü§©**

**üåç Fully Remote** \- Work from anywhere in the world!

**‚úàÔ∏è Global Gatherings** \- Meet the team in epic locations (Croatia,
Portugal, Greece‚Ä¶ we like good views üòâ)

**üìà Career Growth** \- Coaching, training, and conferences on us.

**‚ö° Creative Freedom** \- Your ideas matter. Your work makes a real impact.

**üñ•Ô∏è Tech Gear Budget** \- Get the setup you need to shine.

**üèùÔ∏è Time Off That Counts** \- 24 paid vacation days + 10 ‚ÄúCelebration Leave‚Äù
days for the holidays you actually celebrate.

**üë∂ Paid Parental Leave** \- Because family first, always.

### ‚õµ Your Adventure Through the Hiring Process

Fast. Focused. Built like a great sales flow.

1Ô∏è‚É£ **Warm-Up Call - Let‚Äôs Meet the Human** : A relaxed intro chat with Daizy
from our Talent team. We‚Äôll cover your background, experience, and what kind
of sales environment helps you win - plus a real look at Passion and the role.

**2Ô∏è‚É£ Sales Deep Dive - Show Us Your Edge** : A conversation with Bryan, one
of our senior AEs. This is where we dig into how you sell: Outbound strategy
and volume, qualification instincts, objection handling and results. No
theory. Just real sales talk.

**3Ô∏è‚É£ Live Sales Moment - Let‚Äôs Hear the Hustle üéß:** A mock call with Scott
(SDR). We‚Äôre looking at how you connect, lead a conversation, and move someone
forward - not perfection, just strong instincts and confidence.

**4Ô∏è‚É£ Vision & Culture Match - Think Bigger:** A final chat with Ashley (Head
of Growth / High-Ticket). We‚Äôll align on ambition, standards, and how you‚Äôll
help scale pipeline and revenue as we grow.

**üòè Pro Tip:** We move fast, respect your time, and keep things real. **If
you‚Äôre strong at outbound, this process will feel energizing** \- not
exhausting.

**If this felt like it was written for you‚Ä¶ it probably was. üëä**

Ready to hunt, qualify and win? If outbound lights you up and conversations
are your superpower - we want to meet you!

**üëâ Apply now. Bring your hustle. Let‚Äôs build pipeline that converts.**

‚Äî------------

_Privacy Notice:_

[_Here‚Äôs_](https://passion.io/privacy-policy) _a link to our privacy policy.
In this policy, you will find information about our compliance with GDPR (data
protection law.) You can find how to send us a request to let you access your
data that we have collected, request us to delete your data, correct any
inaccuracies or restrict our processing of your data. All questions, comments
and requests regarding this Privacy Notice should be addressed to
recruiting@passion.io_

**Video Editor (Full-Time, Remote)**

We‚Äôre looking for a full-time Video Editor who lives and breathes video.
Someone who loves experimenting with new formats, integrates AI tools into
their daily workflow, and gets excited about turning attorney insights into
engaging, modern stories. You‚Äôll help lawyers and our own brand stand out with
videos that inform, inspire, and convert, all while shaping the future of AI-
powered content creation.

**About Us**

We help attorneys grow their practices through smart, strategic, and creative
marketing. We‚Äôre a remote team of specialists who believe that the right mix
of strategy, creativity, and innovation drives results and that great work
happens when great people collaborate. Our clients are law firms across the
country, and our mission is simple: create modern marketing that gets them
noticed and trusted. We experiment boldly, learn quickly, and celebrate wins
together. If you‚Äôre excited to merge storytelling with technology and build
something meaningful in the process, you‚Äôll fit right in.

**About the Role**

As our next Video Editor, you‚Äôll be the creative force behind the visual
identity of both the agency and our law firm clients. You‚Äôll edit, enhance,
and reimagine long- and short-form video content for YouTube, TikTok,
Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, and paid ads, transforming talking-head
footage, AI avatar clips, and voiceover scripts into scroll-stopping,
conversion-ready video. You‚Äôll collaborate with our creative team, designers,
and strategists to bring ideas to life through storytelling, editing
precision, and smart use of AI tools. Some days you‚Äôll be polishing a client‚Äôs
educational explainer video; other days, you‚Äôll be crafting agency-branded
content that pushes creative boundaries.

**What You‚Äôll Do**

¬∑ Edit long- and short-form video content for multiple platforms (YouTube,
TikTok, Instagram Reels, YouTube Shorts, etc.)

¬∑ Combine AI-generated and traditional assets, including HeyGen avatars,
ElevenLabs voiceovers, and Descript transcripts, into cohesive, high-quality
videos

¬∑ Experiment with new AI platforms like Veo and Sora and apply them creatively
to enhance storytelling and workflow

¬∑ Incorporate motion graphics, transitions, typography, and animation that
align with each client‚Äôs brand voice and target audience

¬∑ Repurpose long-form content into platform-optimized short clips for social,
ads, and email campaigns

¬∑ Use editing best practices to improve pacing, visual flow, and audience
retention

¬∑ Maintain consistency across client brands and the agency brand

¬∑ Manage multiple projects and deliver on tight deadlines while maintaining
quality

¬∑ Collaborate with our creative team to develop new visual concepts and
editing templates for AI-integrated video production

**What Success Looks Like in 90 Days**

You‚Äôre fully immersed in our creative process, delivering video content that
feels uniquely us: educational, energetic, and professional. You‚Äôve mastered
our branding and voice, integrated seamlessly into our AI-driven workflow, and
your edits are helping both our clients and our agency grow.

**What You Bring to the Table**

¬∑ 3+ years of professional video editing experience

¬∑ A portfolio that shows your creative range and mastery of short-form,
social-first storytelling

¬∑ Proficiency in Adobe Premiere Pro (required) and After Effects (preferred)

¬∑ Experience with AI video tools such as HeyGen (required), ElevenLabs
(required), Descript, Veo, and other emerging platforms

¬∑ Strong understanding of pacing, visual design, and sound design for vertical
and horizontal formats

¬∑ Comfort working in a remote, collaborative environment using tools like
frame.io for feedback

¬∑ The ability to manage multiple projects and meet deadlines without
sacrificing creativity

¬∑ Bonus: familiarity with marketing content or professional service brands

**Portfolio Requirement**

To be considered for this position, you must have an updated portfolio that
includes specific examples of AI-integrated video editing.

Your application will only be reviewed if you follow these instructions:

1. Watch the following videos and can show you can create similar, if not better videos. [https://www.youtube.com/shorts/CJaSGGHwVv4](https://www.youtube.com/shorts/CJaSGGHwVv4) and [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kRvVuwtqdJ4](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kRvVuwtqdJ4) and [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ui8ECnvhMvQ](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ui8ECnvhMvQ)  
  

2. Send an email to [marketing@forwardpush.com](mailto:marketing@forwardpush.com) with the subject line: Video Editor - WWR - 2026  
  

3. Portfolio Submission Requirements, Read Carefully: In your email, include links to three videos you personally created. These are mandatory and non-negotiable:

Required Example #1: Custom HeyGen Avatar (real human you filmed).  
a) This video must use a HeyGen avatar that you personally created from
footage of a real human you filmed yourself.  
b) The human must have been recorded specifically for avatar creation, not
stock footage and not pre-existing content.  
c) Library avatars or pre-built HeyGen avatars are not acceptable and will
disqualify your submission.  
d) You must have handled the filming, avatar creation, and final video output.

Required Example #2: Faceless AI Video With Custom Voice.  
a) This video must be faceless.  
b) The voice must be AI-generated using ElevenLabs or a comparable AI voice
tool.  
c) The voice must be generated from a real person you personally recorded.  
d) Stock voices, pre-made voice libraries, or cloned voices you did not record
yourself are not acceptable.  
e) You must have handled the recording, voice creation, and final video
production.

Required Example #3: AI Video of Your Choice.  
a) This video may be faceless or on-camera.  
b) If an avatar or AI voice is used, it must be created from a real person you
personally recorded.  
c) Stock avatars, stock voices, pre-built libraries, or content you did not
personally record and generate are not acceptable.  
d) You must have handled the full video production process.

Important: If any example uses stock avatars, stock voices, pre-built
libraries, or content you did not personally record and generate, your
application will not be considered.

**Ideal Candidate**

You‚Äôre the kind of editor who sees a timeline and immediately starts
envisioning possibilities. You‚Äôre fluent in both creative intuition and
technical precision ‚Äî equally comfortable adjusting color balance as you are
experimenting with AI-generated B-roll. You stay curious, love learning new
tools, and constantly push for ways to make content smarter, faster, and more
impactful. You get the difference between content that fills a feed and
content that builds a brand ‚Äî and you care about helping law firms and us grow
through your craft.

**Why You‚Äôll Love Working Here**

  * Creative freedom: you‚Äôll shape how AI and human creativity intersect in video marketing.
  * Innovation mindset: experiment with the newest tools and techniques before anyone else.
  * Collaborative culture: work with a small, supportive remote team that values great ideas and great execution.
  * Professional growth: you‚Äôll have opportunities to level up your skills through learning, experimentation, and creative challenges.
  * Purposeful impact: your videos will directly help attorneys connect with clients and build trust online ‚Äî and will fuel own brand story too.

**Compensation**

This is a full-time, remote position. Compensation is competitive and based on
experience, skills, and location.

* * *
